GSP33bbdip11u:22: jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃścāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //
GSP33bbdip11u:33: teṣāṃ cārthanirṇayāya brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:37: maṅgalamācaran śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ grathayati cikīrṣitaṃ ca pratijānīte - 'nārāyaṇam'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:47: tathā ca gurūṃśca natvā sāṣṭāṅgaṃ namaskṛtya 'sūtrārthaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:53: gamyam ityanena caturthādhyāyasya arthaḥ śiṣyahitatayā ādau saṅgṛhīta iti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:55: kintu arāḥ doṣāḥ tadviruddhāḥ nārāḥ guṇāḥ teṣāmāśraya iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:58: aravidhuramuktāśraya iti vā yogenotkṛṣṭaguṇavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:59: tena nārāyaṇa eva śāstrārtha iti pradarśitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:64: tathā ca 'nārāyaṇaṃ natvā guṇairudīrṇaṃ natvā doṣavarjitaṃ natvā';
GSP33bbdip11u:68: na ca 'gurūn nārāyaṇaśabdavācyān nārāyaṇapadenaiva gurunāma covāca,
GSP33bbdip11u:85: anenaiva ślokena śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgabhūtāḥ śāstrādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhāśca śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ sūcitā bhavanti/ @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:86: dvāpare sarvatra jñāne ākulībhūte tannirṇayāya brahmarudrendrādibhirarthito bhagavānnārāyaṇo vyāsatvenāvatatāra /
GSP33bbdip11u:90: prāmāṇyameva kathamityāśaṅkya āptimūlatvādinaiveti parihāramabhipretya vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgadoṣābhāvarūpāptimūlatvopapādanāya sūtrāgatikramamāha - 'dvāpare'; ityādinā /
GSP33bbdip11u:92: dvābhyāṃ yugābhyāṃ parasminnuttarasmin yuge iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:93: vaivasvatamanvantare mahāyugeṣu prathamadvāparāpekṣayāṣṭāviṃśe dharmapādadvayayutatvāt dvāparākhye yuge /
GSP33bbdip11u:98: samyagjñānaṃ saguṇatvādijñānaṃ uta nirguṇatvādijñānamiti vipratipattijanyasandehaviṣayatāṃ nirguṇatvādijñānameva na tvanyaditi mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāpte sati,
GSP33bbdip11u:99: tajjñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ saguṇatvādikaṃ tattvamanyadveti sandehe tādṛgviparyaye ca satīti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:102: idameva tattvaṃ nānyaditi viṣaye samyaktvaniścayārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:106: anyapadārthānāṃ devānāṃ brahmarudrendrādibhiriti yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tat prasiddhaprabhāvānāmapi bhagavaditareṣāmaśakyamidaṃ kāryamiti pradarśanārtham
GSP33bbdip11u:113: tannirṇayāyendrādibhirarthito rudraḥ brahmā ca tataḥ taiḥ sarvairupagamyottamādhikāribhiḥ arthito bhagavāniti buddhyā vivekenānvayaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:114: atheṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihārecchūnāṃ tadyogamavijānatāṃ tajjñāpanārthaṃ vedamutsannaṃ vyañjayaṃścaturdhā vyabhajat,
GSP33bbdip11u:116: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛte ityata āha - atheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:135: tathā ca avāntaravedavibhāgāt prāgeva tataḥ svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt ṛgādirūpāt
GSP33bbdip11u:136: mūlavedāt caturdhā vibhaktaṃ vedaṃ ṛṅnigadādirūpamupavedaṃ vyañjayan adhyāpanenābhivyajya
GSP33bbdip11u:143: adhyetṛṇāmalpaśaktiṃ vīkṣya caturviṃśatidhā ekaśatadhā ekottaraśatākhyaprakāreṇa sahasradhā dvādaśadhā ca vyabhajadityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:145: ṛcaḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ kṛtavān prabhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:147: ityādinā svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt mūlavedāt ṛgādirūpopavedamuddhṛtyābhivyajya tasmādavāntaram ṛgvedādi kṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:148: atra pūrvaṃ dvāparagrahaṇaṃ mahāvedāt uddhṛtasya upavedasya avāntaravedatvena avāntaravedasya ca caturviṃśatyāditvena vibhāgakathanaṃ ca akhilajñānākulībhāvasamarthanārtham
GSP33bbdip11u:154: eko vedaḥ kṛte hyāsīt tretāyāṃ sa tridhābhavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:155: sa eva pañcadhā jāto dvāparaṃ prāpya vai yugam //
GSP33bbdip11u:156: utsannassa kaliṃ prāpya vedaḥ prāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:157: ityatharvaṇabhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛtau kṛtayuge vedaikatvasya tretāyāṃ traividhyamātrasya dvāpare pañcavidhatvasya cokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:160: ityanena tretāyuge caturdhā vibhāgasya dvāpara evotsādasya coktervirodho bhāti /
GSP33bbdip11u:162: tretāyuge prācuryeṇa bhagavadijyāsādhanatvavivakṣayā traividhyoktāvapi vastuta atharvaṇākhyaprakārāntarasattvasya aniṣedhena vidhāntarasyāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:163: dvāpare apauruṣeyasya vedasya caturvidhatve 'pi pauruṣeyairitihāsapurāṇādibhiḥ saha pañcavidhatvasyāpi sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:164: bāhulyena sarvaiḥ prakārairvedasya kalāvutsāde 'pi vyāsāvatārātpūrvaṃ dvāpare 'pyapapāṭhādirūpotsādasya sambhavāt avirodhaḥ/ @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:174: brahmādīnāmarthitvoktyā ca śrotṛdoṣābhāvasya vaktari tannimittavipralambhābhāvasya coktatvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:176: ityanena ajñānanirharaṇasya prasaktatvena prasaṅgadoṣābhāvasya tata evānapahāsasya coktatvādāptimūlatā darśitā bhavati/
GSP33bbdip11u:180: tathā ca siddhaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:188: na kevalamasmābhiḥ kintu skānde coktamiti samuccaye vā 'ca'; śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:191: tathāpi skānde coktamiti prauḍhavādaṃ karoti'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:196: yadvā - utpattyādyaṣṭake jñānasya praviṣṭatvāt tasya nārāyaṇajanyatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:206: idamado veti pūrvoktasaṃśayaviṣayatām anyadeveti mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:208: dvāpare yuge akhilaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ tadanyathā jātamityanvayaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:212: nanu kālaprayuktamanyathātvaṃ cet dvāparayuge bhāgadvayasyaivānyathātvaṃ yuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:213: na tu sarvasyetyato viśeṣakāraṇaṃ cāha - 'gotamasya'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:214: 'tu'; śabdaścārthaḥ śāpe viśeṣakāraṇatvasya jñāne vā samyaktvasya dyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:215: tathā ca gautamasya ṛṣeḥ śāpācca jñāne guṇapūrṇatvādisamyagjñāne ajñānatāṃ nedaṃ tattvajñānamiti tattvajñānabhinnatvaprakārakapratītiviṣayatāṃ sandehaviṣayatāṃ ca gate prāpte sati,
GSP33bbdip11u:220: ajñānādimiśrajñāninaḥ yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ punastadviṣayagataprakāreṣu ajñānasaṃśayādimantaḥ santaḥ 'śaraṇyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:226: taṃ prārthayan svakāryaṃ ca vyajñāpayanniti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:227: atra brahmādibuddhīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ nāma saṅkīrṇabuddhiṣu sajjaneṣu dayāyuktatvameva,
GSP33bbdip11u:231: brahmādidevagonirmātṛvyatiriktalokasya tu gautamahatagonirmātṛtvābhāve 'pi sampradāyapravartakābhāvāt kālataścājñānaprāptiriti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:232: gautamaśāpāgamaprakārastu ittham - pūrvaṃ hi dvādaśavārṣikyāṃ anāvṛṣṭau satyāṃ tayā pīḍitā ṛṣayo gautamāśramaṃ annavantam adhyūṣuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:234: atha anāvṛṣṭau śāntāyāṃ teṣāṃ svasvāśramagamanecchā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:238: haraśirassthasurasaritaṃ sapatnīṃ matvā tāṃ niścikāsayiṣantyā pārvatyā preṣito vināyako brahmacāriveṣeṇa pracchannastānṛṣīnupasasāra,
GSP33bbdip11u:244: yūyaṃ jñānatapobalāt kāñcana māyāmayīṃ māheyīṃ nirmimīdhvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:246: atha sasyagrāsinīṃ tāṃ apakrāmayituṃ prayatiṣyate gautamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:248: tadā brāhmaṇāstaṃ pratibrūta yāvadimāmaśeṣamātaraṃ gāṃ notthāpayiṣyati bhavān tāvanna bhojyānnaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:249: tato haraśirassthadyusaritamavatārya tadvāriṇā abhiṣicya tāmujjīvayatu bhavān ityevamanutāpinaṃ tamabhilapyāpasaratetyuktvā herambo 'mbikāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:250: atha te vināyakena praṇigaditaṃ prayāṇopāyamupasṛtya anvatiṣṭhan/
GSP33bbdip11u:252: tatastāvadgautamaḥ tapasā tryambakamārādhya mandākinīṃ anusamānīya tadvāriṇā surabhimabhiṣiṣeca /
GSP33bbdip11u:254: ata eva godāvarīti tasyāḥ saṃjñā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:256: aśapacca gautamaḥ yadasmadannanimittajñānabalādete gāṃ niramaṃsta tat jñānamapaitviti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:261: śatadhā caikadhā caiva tathaiva ca sahasradhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:263: devaiḥ prārthito bhagavān kimakarodityata āha - 'taiḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:270: san vijñāpitaṃ pratipāditam avatārādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ yasya saḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:282: tāṃśca prāgeva caturdhā vibhaktān vedān punaḥ 'caturdhā vyabhajat';
GSP33bbdip11u:302: vedānāṃ bahutve 'pi arthasyaikatvāttadvivakṣayā tān vedāniti bahuvacananirdiṣṭānāmapi vedānāṃ tasyetyekavacanena nirdeśo nānupapannaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:308: ityatra punaḥ nidrāpagamānantaramiti sudhoktyā 'tṛtīye punareva ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:312: nanu sūtrāntaraireva vedārthanirṇayasambhavātkiṃ brahmasūtrairiti gatārthatāśaṅkāparihārāyāha - 'yeṣām'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:320: kiṃ tat sūtratvaṃ yadāñjasyaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāmityata āha - 'alpa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:321: yāvadakṣaratāṃ vinā śrutyarthābhyāṃ vivakṣitārthasiddhirnāsti tadarthapratipādanāya tāvanmātrākṣaramasati niyāmake tato 'dhikākṣararahitam 'alpākṣaram';
GSP33bbdip11u:329: tattvapradīpe tu ekaṃ prayojanaṃ pratyapekṣitārthasya kṛtsnasya pratipādikaṃ 'viśvatomukham'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:337: ṛgakṣarāvyāptagānabhāgaparipūrakasāmagatastobhākṣarāṇi apaśabdopetatādṛśavākyaṃ ca vyāvartayituṃ krameṇa viśeṣaṇānīti padaprayojanaṃ tattvapradīpoktamanusandheyam
GSP33bbdip11u:338: atra sarvatra dharmikathane 'pi taddvārā sūtrapadapravṛttinimittamapyuktamiti nāsaṅgatiḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:346: tathā ca yato brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratvamasti ata eva hi 'nirviśeṣitasūtratvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:347: nirgatā viśeṣā yasmāttannirviśeṣaṃ tathākhyātaṃ nirviśeṣitaṃ tādṛśaṃ sūtrapadaṃ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:349: tasyābhāvo 'sya sañjātaḥ tādṛśaḥ sūtraśabdo yasya tasya bhāvo nirviśeṣitasūtratvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:357: anena brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratve nirviśeṣitaśabdavācyatvāditi heturukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:358: atra hetoraprayojakatvamāśaṅkya vyāptivacanena tāṃ parihartuṃ tatra prathamaṃ yadyannanirviśeṣitaṃ tattanna mukhyamityanvayavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'yathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:361: tathā ca yathā ekasyaiva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsatvaṃ nirviśeṣitavyāsapadavācyatvamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:363: idānīṃ ye amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣapadavācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣapadavācyāḥ iti vyatirekavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'anye'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:377: tatra nirviśeṣitatvahetoḥ samavyāptipareṇa tadarthameva prāguktavyatirekavyāptidṛṣṭāntavacanenopapāditānvayavyāptikamanumānaṃ niyāmakatvenāha - 'saviśeṣaṇa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:416: tathā ca mukhyāmukhyayornirviśeṣaṇasaviśeṣaṇaśabdavācyatve vedo vṛddhavyavahāraśca pramāṇamityuktatvānna tayoḥ kāraṇāntaraṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:419: tathāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sūtrāntaraireva sambhavāt kiṃ brahmasūtrairiti codyasya kathaṃ 'yeṣām';
GSP33bbdip11u:420: ityanena parihāra ukta ityatastadvākyoktaṃ vivṛṇoti - 'sūtreṣu'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:423: nirṇayasya sarvatvaṃ viṣayadvārā tasya ca śabdadvārā bodhyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:424: tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ sarvaśākhārthanirṇayāḥ bhāvyatayā samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:430: sati caivaṃ tadantargataṃ sūtradharmatayoktaṃ viśvatoṇukhatvamapi teṣāmevāñjasā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:433: yata evamataḥ sarvavedaśākhārthanirṇāyakānāṃ brahmasūtrāṇām asarvanirṇāyakebhyo 'nyasūtrebhyo 'tiśayena nirṇāyakatvāt yuktaṃ 'tasyārthavittaye brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:434: tacchabdaghaṭitaṃ tadvacanaṃ tādarthyena sūtrakaraṇavacanamiti bhavati tena śaṅkāparihāra iti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:438: tathā ca aṃśe gatārthatetyāśaṅkāparihārāyāñjasyoktyā sūcitamanyaccāha - 'śabdajātasya'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:440: ata evoktaṃ sudhāyām “etanmīmāṃsopajīvinī khalu seti purāṇe paṭhyate śabdajātasyeti“iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:454: yathā śrutimūlakasmṛteravaiyarthyaṃ tadvadavaiyarthyopapattermūlena mūlino vaiyarthyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:470: ityuktāḥ pañcavidhā api muktiyogyāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:472: jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya bhagavān krīḍate puruṣottamaḥ / ityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:476: tathā ca puruṣottamo mahāyaśāḥ uttamaśloko bhagavān vyāso yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:480: tadupajīvī - taṃ vinā avāntaratātparyajñānamātreṇa muktiphalāsiddheriti coktaṃ 'yeṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:481: iti pūrvavākye pramāṇe ca - evaṃvidhāni etādṛkprakārāṇi sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahmarudrādideveṣu manuṣyapitṛpakṣiṣu jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya krīḍata iti mahāvākyayojanā
GSP33bbdip11u:483: iti pāṭhe aiśvaryam evaṃvidhasūtrakaraṇe asāmarthyaśaṅkānirāsakatayoktamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:484: atra brahmādiṣu jñānasaṃsthāpanaṃ nāma pūrvaṃ sthitasyaiva jñānasya viśeṣayuktyādibhiḥ dṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ kiñcidaprāptalābhaścocyate1,
GSP33bbdip11u:487: na ca 'evaṃ jñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāśca ṛṣayastathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:499: tathā ca viṣayābhāvāt pratyagrūpe brahmaṇyahamiti pratīyamāne 'pi mokṣānuphalambhena
GSP33bbdip11u:500: prayojanābhāvāt tata eva tatpratibaddhādhikāryabhāvācca na brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti
GSP33bbdip11u:506: yathātraiva jijñāsādhikaraṇe “tadvijijñāsasva“iti jijñāsābhidhāyakavākyavihitā śravaṇādirūpā jijñāsā viṣayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:524: sāpi ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī ityādirūpeṇa bahuvidhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:531: atra sūtre ādyantayoroṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatrādya eka eva dṛṣṭādṛṣṭobhayārthaḥ ata eva sūtrāvayavaḥ sarvasūtreṣu anuvṛttyarthamasaṃhitatayoccāryate
GSP33bbdip11u:533: ante tu pakṣadvaye 'pi adṛṣṭārtha eka evoṅkāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:552: oṃ brahmaśabdayorubhayoryaugikatve 'pi ekasya rūḍhatvena viśeṣyavācitvaṃ anyasya yaugikatvena viśeṣaṇavācitvamāśrityānvayāṅgīkārānnānyataravaiyarthyam
GSP33bbdip11u:557: granthādau maṅgalācaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvena maṅgalaprayojakatayā athaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - 'atha'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:559: tathā praśastarūpānuṣṭheyamaṅgalātmako viṣṇuḥ tadguṇo vābhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:564: muktyarthimātrasya brahmajijñāsāyāṃ pravṛttinirasanatātparyeṇāpi prayuktasyākhaṇḍāthaśabdasya vācyamarthamāha - 'adhikāra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:566: na kevalaṃ maṅgalaprayojakaḥ kintvānantaryābhidhāyakaśceti viṣayasamuccaye vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:579: nanvathātaḥ śabdapūrvakatvaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ kiṃ nimittaṃ vighnanivartakaśabdoccāraṇādeḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:580: “maṅgalaṃ tataḥ“iti śabdāntaroccāraṇenāpi sambhavādityāśaṅkāṃ purāṇavacanenaiva nirākaroti - 'uktañca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:583: kintu gāruḍe ceti samuccaye vā ca śabdaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:603: nanvavaśyavaktavyārthatvaṃ svarūpottamattvam arthata ādhikyaṃ vā niyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyādyapakṣe pṛcchati - 'kaśca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:615: tathā ca - tayorathātaḥśabdayoḥ arthataḥ uttamatā ādhikyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:617: atra ādyatṛtīyapakṣayoravaśyavaktavyārthatārthādhikyayostadabhāvayośca loke śabdāntareṣu darśanāt athātaśśabdayostatsandehāt praśna eva na tvākṣepaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:618: dvitīyapakṣe tu svarūpādhikyasya śabdāntareṣvadarśanāt ākṣepa eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:622: etadākhyāhi me brahman yathā jñāsyāmi tattvataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:642: avaśyakartavyaprayojanakatvācca prathamamathaśabdaprayoga iti bhāvenāthaśabdo maṅgalārtha iti svoktārthe pramāṇaṃ darśayati - 'maṅgalārthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:645: tathā ca - maṅgalarūpaprayojanārthaṃ ca athaśabdaḥ sūtrakāraissamudīritaḥ prayukto bhavedityarthaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:652: evamathaśabdasya avasyavaktavyārthatvarūpaṃ prathamaprayoganiyāmakaṃ pradarśya ataḥśabdasyāpi taddarśayati - 'ataḥśabdastu hetvarthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:654: heturliṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca sa cāsāvartho 'bhidheyaśca tasmin tadviṣaye tadvācakatayā sūtrakṛdbhiḥ 'samudīritaḥ'; ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:655: gurvarthadīpikāyāntu “hetvarthe iti svavākye pramāṇe ca 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan';
GSP33bbdip11u:659: hetāvityanuktvā arthaśabdagrahaṇaṃ śabdādhikyādarthādhikyamiti nyāyena prakṛterheturarthaḥ pratyayasya tu hetutvamartha iti prakṛtipratyayobhayārthakathanārtham
GSP33bbdip11u:660: yadvā - arthaśabdasyobhayatra śravaṇātsa pūrvatrāpyanuṣañjanīya iti jñāpanāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:662: parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ prasādāditi vā bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:682: kintu kartavyajijñāsāyāṃ jñānamokṣayorathaśabdārthādhyayanādau ca kāraṇatvenānvaya ityāśayena pṛthaguktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:687: nanu jijñāsādyarthaṃ kiṃ bhagavatprasādena yenāsāvavaśyavaktavyārthaḥ syādityata āha - 'sa hi'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:690: sarveṣāṃ adhikāriṇāṃ sarvasmin pūrṇe viṣṇau manovṛtteḥ prerakaḥ prāvaṇyahetuḥ 'samudāhṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:694: evaṃ sarvāsāṃ manovṛttīnāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ ṭīkāsthādipadagṛhītānāṃ jñānādhyayanādīnāṃ manovṛttisādhyamokṣādeśca prerakaḥ sampādakaḥ ityapi vyākhyeyam
GSP33bbdip11u:699: kṛtacodyasya kaḥ parihāra ityato na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvādathātaḥśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:710: svasamānajātīyaśabdāntarotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ oṅkāro 'tha śabdaścetyetau kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā 'vinissṛtau';
GSP33bbdip11u:717: nanu dvayorekavidhaṃ prāthamikatvaṃ viruddhamityata uktaṃ 'kramāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:722: athaśabdasya oṅkāreṇa saha svarūpādhikayamabhidhāya ataḥśabdasyāpi tadāha - 'tat'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:726: sa coddeśyasamarpakasya ata ityasya śabdaparatvajñāpanadvārā tṛtīyatayoktatvādividhānārthaḥ anyathā svarūpādhikyakathanadaśāsaṅgatiḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:729: tathāpi hetuśabdasya liṅgārthatvapakṣe tatsvarūpaṃ vivarituṃ kāraṇārthatvapakṣe tatkāryaṃ tasipratyayārthaṃ ca pradarśayituṃ 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:744: tasya prasannasyākāravācyasya viṣṇostatra jijñāsādau kāraṇatvaṃ tasipratyayena vadanprakṛtyaiva tasya jijñāsādermokṣahetutvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vā vadan 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:748: yata evamato 'taśśabdo 'pi tṛtīyatayā prāthamika udāhṛta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:749: tathā ca - maṅgalaśabdena maṅgaloktāvapi tasya svarūpādhikyānukteḥ athātaḥśabdābhyāmivādhikāraprayojanayoranukteśca na tena gatārthatā,
GSP33bbdip11u:751: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ “maṅgaloktyādeḥ“ityādiśabdaḥ tataśśabdena hetvānantaryapratiyogyadhikārasūcane 'pi na tasyādisūtre niveśā yuktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:754: na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvāt nāpi svarūpādhikyāt athātaśśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:756: ato 'pi prathamaprayoga iti bhāvena kathamiti tṛtīyapraśnasya prākarāntareṇottaramāha - 'akāraḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:778: tathā ca - tasya akāravācyasya parabrahmaṇo vyāptisthityabhidāyakau ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:782: thakārasya tu avikāreṇa avasthitirartha ityarthabhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:784: iti pāṭhabhedamaṅgīkṛtya prāṇātmakaṃ prāṇapraṇetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ vācakatvena prāptāviti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:785: yadyapi sūtre praviṣṭasya sarvanāmaprakṛtikasya ataśśabdasya naivamavayavārthakathanaṃ yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:788: tathāpi athaśabdasya arthata ādhikyānukteḥ tadgatavarṇayoḥ asarvanāmaprakṛtikātaśśabdagatavarṇayośca vākyārthāpraviṣṭātiśayitārthāntaroktiriyamityadoṣaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:789: ataśca pūrvamuccāryāḥ sarva ete satāṃ matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:835: caśabdo na kevalamadhikāraḥ kintu tadvibhāgaśca bhāgavatatantrākhyagranthe 'bhihita iti samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:836: atra pramāṇe adhikārikathane 'pi tadviśeṣaṇatayā devatvādirūpo 'pyadhikāraḥ ukto bhavatīti nāsaṅgatiḥ/ @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:842: tatra mandā manuṣyeṣu ya uttamagaṇā matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:843: 'tatra'; trividheṣu madhye manuṣyeṣu ye uttamagaṇāḥ te mokṣayogyeṣu mandādhikāriṇa ityuddeśyavidheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:874: asya ca mokṣayogyatvasya svarūpatvenānadhikāraḥ daśāyāmapi sattvādvyāpterdhrauvyādityataḥ prakārāntareṇa adhikāriṇaḥ svarūpamāha - 'tathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:885: atra - avaiṣṇavasya vede 'pi hyadhikāro na vidyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:893: tathā ca - yo naraḥ parame viṣṇau bhaktimān adhyayanavāṃśca so 'dhamo 'dhikārīti prāmāṇikaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:894: yaḥ śamādisaṃyukto naraḥ sa madhyama iti proktaḥ // @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:901: parabrahma tu sarvasāraṃ sarvathā nityaṃ ceti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:907: viṣṇupāda eva eko mukhyaḥ saṃśrayo mama śaraṇamiti jñānaṃ yasya saḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:910: sannyastaṃ bhagavati samarpitaṃ akhilaṃ yadakāmyaṃ karma tadvān 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:913: atra sannyāso nāma bhagavān sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti sarvakarmāṇi bhagavatpūjārūpāṇīti ca jñātvā bhrāntyā jīvakartṛkatvena jñātānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhagavati visargaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:918: na ca militānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ triṣvabhāvādasambhavaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:920: uttaravākye pūrvasya pūrvavākye cottarasyānukarṣeṇa sarvatra sarvasya satvābhyupagamenāsambhavābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:926: ta evottaratra saṅgṛhītāḥ pūrvatrānukṛṣṭāśca guṇā uttaroktāsteṣāṃ tatratatra bhaktimānityādiyathāsthitamūloktaguṇāpekṣayāprācuryeṇeti pakṣāntaramāhuḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:927: candrikāyāṃ tu pūrvapūrvasmin uttarottarasminnuktāprācuryeṇeti ṭīkārthamāśritya samānādhikaraṇānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:931: yaḥ pracuraviṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayatvādimān - itare tvapracure - sa uttamādhikārīti tallakṣaṇamedāt traividhyopapattiriti uktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:937: tatkutaḥ? udāhṛtapramāṇe brahmavidyāyāmiti kaṇṭhato 'nukteḥ kutaśca tatrādhikāratraividhyamityata āha - 'adhyayana'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:949: “śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvā ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet“(bṛ-u. 6-4-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:958: tattvapradīpe tu - vaiṣṇavasiddhāntādacalanaṃ śama iti paryavasitamuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:962: bṛhadbhāṣyarītyā - upa samīpe svahṛdayesthe viṣṇau santoṣavāniti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:966: iti vacanāt samaṃ yathārthamāhitamādhānaṃ manovṛttirūpaṃ jñānaṃ icchā ca yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:977: śāntādirbhūtvātmānaṃ vidyādityanena upanayanasya adhyayanārthatvavat śāntyāderbrahmavidyārthatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:978: yadyapi paśyatīti śrutipāṭhaḥ tathāpi viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ “sa tathā cakāreti kvacitpāṭhaḥ sa sadṛśaśākhāntaragato jñātavyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:979: evamanyatrāpi“ityuktatvāt tannyāyenāyamapi sadṛśaśākhāntaragato vā paśyatītyasyārthānuvādo vetyadoṣaḥ// @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1001: yadvā - samprāptau sampuṭīkṛtau ariktau vā pāṇī yasya /
GSP33bbdip11u:1008: parito vīkṣya pāralaukikatvena tadviparītānapi karmabhiścitān svargādilokān vināśina eva parīkṣya tebhyo 'nirvedamāyāt'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:1014: atrāpi vijñānapadena brahmajñāniparabrāhmaṇapadena ca uttamādhikārī sūcitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1036: iti prameyadīpoktarītyā vṛṇuta ityanena bhaktatvaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1042: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33bbdip11u:1043: sā ca bhaktiḥ viṣṇau sarvādhikā anyeṣvapi yathāyogyā brahmavidyopayoginītyarthe śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ śrutiṃ (śve. 6-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:1059: anyeṣu svottameṣu ca yathā yogyā bhaktirasti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1082: kintu “bhaktyā tvananyayā śakya ahamevaṃ vidhorjuna jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ“(bha.gī. 11-54)
GSP33bbdip11u:1085: nanu yadyadhyayanavatāmeva brahmavidyādhikāraḥ tarhi trivarṇetareṣāmadhyayanābhāvenādhikāro na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1086: tataśca teṣāṃ brahmajñānābhāvena mokṣābhāvassyādityāśaṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati - 'vyomasaṃhitāyāṃ ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1094: ayaṃ cārtho “viṣṇunāmasvādhyāyo 'ntyānāṃ“ityetadavatārikārūpatayā “nāgnirna yajñaḥ śūdrasyetyādestrivarṇabāhyānāṃ“iti nyāyadīpikayā sūcitaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1099: kintu ye antyajāḥ trivarṇabāhyāḥ śūdrādayaḥ pulkasāntāḥ te yadyapi vaidikabrahmajñānānadhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1100: tathāpi yato bhaktāḥ ato nāmajñānādhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇunāmajñānatatsvādhyāyādhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1106: striyaśca śūdrāśca brahmabandhavo brāhmaṇābhāsāśca teṣāmiti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1112: ekadeśe parokte tu na tu granthapurassare /
GSP33bbdip11u:1118: pareṇānyena parārthaṃ prokte ārabdha evetyāha - 'ekadeśa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1122: anena strīśūdrādimātraṃ puraskṛtya purāṇādigranthapravacanamapi na kāryamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1126: pariśeṣāt traivarṇikānāṃ cet - teṣāmapi kiṃ sarveṣāmadhikāraḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:1134: “(maṃ-pra-16-2) ityādau strīṇāmapi vedādhikāradarśanāt kathaṃ tāsāmanadhikāra ityata uktasyāpavādamāha - 'āhuḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1139: tathāca - na kevalamuttamānāṃ devānāṃ strīṇāṃ nāmādijñāne 'dhikāraḥ kintu vaidike 'pi jñāne vedotpannabrahmavidyāyāmapi vaidikāḥ adhikāramāhuriti yojanā / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1140: yathorvaśī yamī caiva śacyādyāśca tathāparāḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1162: tathāca - yatassukhameva me syāt duḥkhamīṣadapi mābhūditi sarvābhimato 'mokṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1168: uktaṃ hi śabdādhikaraṇe tattvapradīpe “mokṣasyaiva paramapuruṣārthatvāt tasya ca
GSP33bbdip11u:1169: samīco vinā viṣṇuprasādāt alabhyatvāt tasya ca atimātrasya aparokṣajñānaprasādhyatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:1173: anena sūtre yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1179: ato brahmajijñāsā kartavyetyanvayapradarśanamukhena ataśśabdasya mokṣasādhanaprasādasādhanajñānasādhanatvāditi heturartha ityetadvivṛtaṃ bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:1180: evaṃ yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na jñānaṃ na jijñāsā kintu prasādenaiva iti yojanāyāṃ ataḥśabdasyārthāntaramapi vivṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1183: vākyaṃ veti satāṃ nītiḥ sāvakāśe na tadbhavatet //
GSP33bbdip11u:1186: iti padasyaiva adhyāhāraḥ kutaḥ adhyāhārasya niraṅkuśatvena 'na kartavyā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1187: iti vākyasyaivādhyāhāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yatra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1199: yatra vākye yasmin vākye sāvakāśe arthāntare ghaṭanāvati sati tadeva padaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāptaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:1200: evaṃ yatra mahāvākye yadavāntaravākyaṃ vinānyatrānavasaraḥ tatra mahāvākye tadeva vākyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1201: yatra yasmin mahāvākye sāvakāśe sati tadavāntaravākyaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ na bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1202: yatra vākye yatpadaṃ vākyaṃ vāpekṣitaṃ anyatrānyasyānavasara iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1214: ityanena prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - 'taṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1226: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tu ṭīkāsudhoktarītyā prasādaṃ vinā vidvatpadalakṣyāparokṣajñānamātreṇa mokṣo na bhavatītyanyathānupapattyaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:1229: “priyo hi jñāninotyarthamahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ”/
GSP33bbdip11u:1232: iti yadaparokṣajñānasya prasādasādhanatvamuktaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra gītāsmṛtimāha 'priyo hi'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1239: “ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ“
GSP33bbdip11u:1241: kintu śrutyā cetyāśayena tatra kaṭhaśrutimāha 'yaṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1250: ata eva viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyām “eṣa paramātmā yaṃ vṛṇute yasya prasīdati tenaiva labhyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1251: kathaṃ? yatastasya svāṃ tanuṃ vivṛṇute prakāśayati,
GSP33bbdip11u:1252: tataścāsya svāṃ tanuṃ avidyāvṛtasvarūpāṃ vivṛṇute āvirbhāvayati“iti prakṛtānukūlatayā samagravākyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1253: yatpūrvaṃ jijñāsāyāḥ aparokṣajñānasādhanatvamupaskṛtavākyenoktaṃ tatra pramāṇatevana śrutimāha 'ātmā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1278: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatābodhake “tamevaṃ vidvān“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute“ityādāviva “priyo hi“iti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvādityāśṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati - 'karmaṇā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1301: iti śruteḥ kāmyakarmaṇāṃ vairāgyajananadvārā mokṣe 'pyupayogo 'stīti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1302: evaṃ akāmyakarmasādhyāt adhamaprasādāt antaḥkaraṇaśuddhyādidvārā mokṣo bhavatītyapi jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1303: na ca adhamaprasādaśūnyānāṃ atidveṣiṇāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ kathaṃ svargaprāptiriti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1307: yānti svargaṃ tataḥ kṣipraṃ tamondhaṃ prāpnuvanti ca //
GSP33bbdip11u:1309: iti / svargaloka ityuktyā tatraiva “mokṣaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ bhūtāditvaṃ phalaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1310: kramāt“iti vacanokto yo nityasaṃsāribhī rājasarājasai rājasatāmasaiśca prāpya svargapratinidhitvena
GSP33bbdip11u:1311: kalpito daityendralokaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ sa iha na vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1312: kintu saptalokāntargato rājasasāttvikaiḥ prāpyaḥ svargaloka eveti sūcitam / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1315: ityatra tu janatyāgena janākhyalokasyaiva pratipattayarthaṃ lokaśabdaprayoga iti jñeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1319: viṣṇoḥ prasādāt janalokasyādirmaharlokaḥ janatapolokādireva vā bhavati na muktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1323: tathā ca karmādinā bhagavatprasādasiddhāvapi tasyānuttamatvāt jñānasādhyasyaivottamatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:1324: anuttamena svargādimātrasiddhāvapi mokṣāsiddheḥ tatsādhanaprasādāya jñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1325: na cātra “īyustrīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān“iti vākyavirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1333: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva dhyānaṃ bhaktistathaiva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:1335: tathāpi “karmaṇā jñānamātanoti“ityādeḥ karmādināpi jñānaṃ bhavatīti na tadarthaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1356: na caitāni vinā kaścit jñānamāpa kutaścana //
GSP33bbdip11u:1358: viparītaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1364: evametāni śravaṇādīni santicet kutaśca karmādervinā jñānaṃ nāpeti neti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1365: tathā ca nirapekṣānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śravaṇādyeva jñāne pradhānaṃ sākṣātsādhanaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1366: karmādi tu tadabhāvāt pāramparyeṇa sādhanamiti na vaiparītyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1371: ityanena jijñāsāyāḥ nirviṣayatvaśaṅkānirāsāya prayuktaḥ sautro brahmaśabdo nārāyaṇapara iti vyākhyātaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1373: nanu nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaścet tarhi tajjijñāsaiva kartavyā na brahmajijñāsā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1374: na ca vācyaṃ nārāyaṇa eva brahmapadena vivakṣitaḥ sūtrakṛteti,
GSP33bbdip11u:1375: brahmaśabdasya bahvarthatvena sūtrakāravivakṣāviśeṣasya durjñeyatvādityata āha - 'brahma'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1380: tathā ca brahmaśabdasyānekārthatve 'pi yataḥ saḥ viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ ato mukhyāmukhyayormukhyasyaiva grāhyatvāt sa eva sūtrakāravivakṣito jñāyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1381: atra śabdāntaraṃ vihāya viṣṇuśabdaprayogeṇa tacchabdagatānāṃ vargapañcamaṣaṣṭhacaturthānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1382: ṇaṣavānāṃ saṅkhyārekhālekhanena sūtrāṇāṃ catuṣṣaṣṭyuttarapañcaśatasaṅkhyoktā bhavati / yadvā -
GSP33bbdip11u:1390: tattvapradīpe 'pyetadeva 'yaśca devatāmīmāṃsānte “viṣṇureva hi tat śrutestaṃ brahmetyācakṣate“iti sarvadevottamatvena pratijñāto brahmatvena
GSP33bbdip11u:1394: brahmaśabdasyānyatrāpi rūḍhatvādrūḍhereva mukhyavṛttitvātkuto 'sau viṣṇāveva mukhya ityata āha - 'yaṃ'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1407: yadoṣadhībhiḥ puruṣān paśūṃśca viveśa bhūtāni carācarāṇi /
GSP33bbdip11u:1408: ataḥ paraṃ nānyadaṇīyasaṃ hi parātparaṃ yanmahato mahāntam //
GSP33bbdip11u:1418: yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī toyena jīvānvyasasarja bhūmyām //
GSP33bbdip11u:1428: ityādyuktvā “tadevartaṃ tadu satyamāhustadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnām“
GSP33bbdip11u:1434: ityanenaiva siddhe yajñāṅgatvādinā viśiṣṭānāṃ vrīhyoṣadhīnāṃ grahaṇāya punarvacanam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1460: ādyapakṣe 'pi vi ā sasarjetyavayavavibhāgaḥ tatrāṅgo hrasvatvaṃ chāndasaṃ bahulagrahaṇāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1461: “indrā varuṇa vāmaham“iti śrutau ṇakārātparasyākārasya yathā hrasvatvaṃ tadvaditi nārāyaṇapaṇḍitācāryoktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:1468: “yaṃ puruṣaṃ samudre 'ntaḥ kavayo vayanti vāñchanti tadakṣare yasmin tasmin akṣare nāśavarjite parame prajāstadādhārāḥ tiṣṭhanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:1469: jagataḥ prasūtī jagajjanayitrī prakṛtiḥ yataḥ prasūtā prādurbhūtā satī toyena itaramiśritena
GSP33bbdip11u:1471: tadevābādhitarūpatvātsatyaṃ tadeva kavīnāmabhimataṃ paraṃ brahma“ityartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1473: iti paṭhitvā “yamavayanti avagacchanti yasmiṃstasmin akṣare prajāḥ santi yataḥ prasūtā
GSP33bbdip11u:1474: parādhīnaviśeṣaṃ prāptā śrīḥ toyena karmaṇā jīvān bhūmyāṃ prakṛtyāṃ vyasasarja“ityanvayena
GSP33bbdip11u:1503: ityādītaraśabdaśravaṇāt rudrāderapi mukhyabrahmatā prāptetyata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1507: nāmani viśvābhi na santi loke yadāvirāsīdanṛtasya sarvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1508: kuta ityatastatprāpakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇāveva mukhyatvāditi hetūpaskārabhipretya tasyāsiddhiparihārāya viṣṇormukhyataḥ sarvanāmavācyatve śrutimāha - 'nāmāni'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1520: nāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti taṃ vai viṣṇuṃ paramamudāharanti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1521: tarhi kasmin tāni mukhyānītyata āha 'nāmāni'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1533: mukhyato na santi mukhyato na lokavācakāni 'yat'; yasmāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:1544: “yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eva eva taṃ sampraśnaṃ bhuvanā yantyanyā“
GSP33bbdip11u:1546: nanu yathā viṣṇoḥ śrutyantarasiddhasarvanāmatvenātroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ siddhyati tathā rudrādīnāmapi viṣṇvādiśabdavācyatvena atroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yaḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1552: ityādau nānyeṣāṃ prāptiḥ ata eva na brahmatvaṃ teṣāmiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1555: - viśvapāśabdavadayaṃ śabdaḥ - nāmadhārakaḥ na tvanye 'pi 'taṃ praśnaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1563: viśvakarmeti śrutibalādasya sūktākhyaprakaraṇasya viśvakarmādyanyaparatayā tadgatayacchabdasyāpi tatparatvaucityādityata āha - 'ajasya'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1566: utsargato liṅgāt śruteḥ prābalye 'pi sāvakāśāyā viśvakarmaśruteḥ niravakāśaliṅgena bādhopapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1574: nābhyarpitaṃ padmādanyatkiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1576: prasiddhaṃ viṣṇunābhisthatvena prasiddhaṃ padmākhyārthaṃ 'vinānyo 'rtho'; na yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1578: viśvakarmaśrutivatpadmanābhatvaliṅgamapyanyasya kiṃ na syādityato vādmaha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1581: ajasya nābhāviti yasya nābherabhūt śruteḥ puṣkaraṃ lokasāram /
GSP33bbdip11u:1582: na kevalaṃ prasiddhibalādevaitacchrutyuktaṃ padmaṃ padmanābhaśca harirityavasīyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1594: viśvasya jagato vibhūtayaḥ sṛṣṭyādyaṣṭakaṃ jīvādau vyastāḥ vistṛtāḥ jaḍādau samastāḥ saṃkṣiptāḥ viśvavibhūtayo yenāsau vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtistasmai
GSP33bbdip11u:1596: tattvapradīpe tu - samastaviśvavibhūtayo yena vyastā sa vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1597: atha vā vyastāḥ samastā viśvavibhūtayo yeneti dvedhā vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1610: yadā niravakāśaliṅgamātraṃ śrutibādhakaṃ tadā kimu vācyaṃ samākhyāyuktaṃ taditi bhāvenāha - 'para'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1613: tathā ca yataḥ viśvakarmasūkte “paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhirasurairyadasti“iti yā ākhyā uktiḥ tasyāḥ samā samānā 'paro divā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1617: “yaṃ kāmaye taṃ tamugraṃ kṛṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tamṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām“
GSP33bbdip11u:1619: nanu samākhyāśrutāvapi viṣṇuḥ kuto vācya ityata āha - 'yaṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1624: iti samākhyāśrutau metyākhyā mākhyā tayā sahitā samākhyā “prakṛtirvāva samāsamā“(mādhyandinaśrutiḥ)
GSP33bbdip11u:1627: ahamiti prakṛtā lakṣmīḥ “yaṃ“ityādivākyena brahmādīnāṃ svādhīnatvamuktvā “mama yonirapsvantaḥ samudre” iti vākyena “paro divā“ityuktaṃ viṣṇuṃ svakāraṇatvena samudrasthatvena cāha,
GSP33bbdip11u:1629: uktvetyanena lakṣmīkāraṇaṃ brahmādyanyatamaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkā vāritā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1646: ahametāvatī yathoktaprakārā mahimnā nāto 'dhiketi vā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1657: sumedhasaṃ vā kartuṃ kāmaye taṃ taṃ tathā karomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1666: patināma na grāhyamiti bhāvena nārāyaṇa ityanuktvā tadarthabodhanāyaivamuktiḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1670: nanvatra samudrastho rudraḥ kiṃ na syāt 'tapyamānāya salile';
GSP33bbdip11u:1674: tathā ca atrogra ityukto rudra eva bhavet,
GSP33bbdip11u:1688: nanu prasiddhyādisadbhāve 'pi tatparityāgenānyasvīkāre kiṃ bādhakamityata āha - 'na ca'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1701: yato 'tra yadi rudro lakṣmyadhīnatayograpadenocyate tarhi “viśvādhiko rudraḥ“ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ato 'tra tatparityāgo yukta ityata āha - 'ukta'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1709: viśvo vāyuḥ adhiko yasmādviśvādhika ityarthāśrayaṇena vā 'etameva';
GSP33bbdip11u:1713: vede rāmāyaṇe caiva purāṇe bhārate tathā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1715: viṣṇureva 'vede rāmāyaṇe ca purāṇe tathā bhārate'; / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1716: ādāvante ca madhye ca viṣṇussarvatra gīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1724: sarvatra prativākyaṃ pratipadaṃ pratyakṣaraṃ ca mukhyataḥ pratipādyata ityarthaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1734: tatra rudrādīnāṃ sarvottamatvasya sarvakāraṇatvasya cokteḥ ityata āha - 'na ca'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1740: kuta ityata teṣāṃ mohārthaṃ kṛtatvāditi hetvadhyāhāramabhipretya tasyāsiddhiṃ pramāṇodāharaṇena nirāha - 'eṣa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1746: na ca asya 'na mohaśāstrasya vaktā viṣṇurāśaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1755: iti nyāyadīpokteḥ ya eṣa iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1759: tvaṃ ca rudra mahābāho mohaśāstrāṇi kāraya /
GSP33bbdip11u:1774: vyadhikaraṇatvena vidyamānāni viṣṇuniṣṭhāni vāyuniṣṭhāni vā rudrādiniṣṭhatayocyamānāni sarvottamatvasarvasvātantryaviṣabhakṣaṇādīni 'darśayasva';
GSP33bbdip11u:1776: prakāśaṃ kuru cātmānamaprakāśaṃ ca māṃ kuru /
GSP33bbdip11u:1786: kecittu - prakāśo 'syāstīti prakāśamiti arśaādyajantatvamāśritya uddeśyadvitīyānāśrayaṇena prakāśaṃ prasiddhamiti vyācakṣate / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1792: liṅgamūlānveṣaṇakathā tu - pūrvaṃ jagatkartṛtvaviṣaye viṣṇuviriñcayorvivādo 'bhūt ahameva jagataḥ kartā na matto 'nyaḥ iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1794: tau tat dṛṣṭvā sarvadevasannidhau parasparaṃ samayaṃ cakratuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1795: tatra brahmā viṣṇumāha - avayormadhye 'sya liṅgasya yo 'ntamādiṃ ca gacchati sa bhavedadhiko loke,
GSP33bbdip11u:1799: evaṃ tau samayaṃ kṛtvā mārgamāṇau nirgatau /
GSP33bbdip11u:1802: atha punarviṣṇuḥ svasthānaṃ samāgatya sarvadevasannidhau ahaṃ liṅgasyādimadrākṣamiti satyam āha /
GSP33bbdip11u:1803: brahmāpi samāgatya ahamantamadrākṣamiti chadmanā mṛṣā āha /
GSP33bbdip11u:1804: atha liṅgarūpī maheśvaraḥ tayorvacaḥ śrutvā he viṣṇo yatastvaṃ satyamevāvocaḥ ataḥ tava loke matsamā pūjā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1806: tato brahmā he rudra mamānṛtoktikṛtāparādhastvayā kṣantavya ityāha /
GSP33bbdip11u:1807: tato rudro na mama vaco mithyā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1820: tadaivācyuta yāntyeva yadaiva tvaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1825: śvapacādapi śvānaṃ pacatīti śvapaco nīcaḥ tasmādapi 'kaṣṭatvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1827: asya tarkatvāttasya viparyayaparyavasāne brahmādīnāṃ viṣṇvadhīnatvam atyantatadanugrahapātratvaṃ ca siddhyatīti na pramāṇavirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1831: nāhaṃ na ca śivo 'nye ca tacchaktyekāṃśabhāginaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1838: 'asmābhiḥ'; ityatra śivaścānye ca ahaṃ ca vayaṃ tairityekaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1840: tasyācyutasya yā śaktiḥ sāmarthyaṃ tasyaikāṃśabhāgino na bhavāmaḥ tathāpi 'yadvat';
GSP33bbdip11u:1855: tathā ca teṣāṃ śaivāditve 'pi na virodhitvam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1857: na ca viparītaṃ kiṃ na syāditi vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1859: tatraiva viṣṇūtkarṣoktau tatra prāmāṇyasya śivādyutkarṣādāvaprāmāṇyasya ca niścayena vaiparītyāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1860: tasmātpāśupatādiparikalpitaśivādyuttamatvaparipāṭī darśanabhāṣayā teṣūpanyasyata iti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1872: tarhi vaiṣṇaveṣu rāmakṛṣṇādiviṣṇukartṛkaśivastutyādi kathamucyata ityata āha - 'tacca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1876: tathā ca - co yato vaiṣṇaveṣu yacchivastutyādyucyate tattu 'eṣa moham';
GSP33bbdip11u:1889: tasya cāsandhigdhatvānna jijñāsyatvamiti prāptetannirākartuṃ brahmaśabdena jīvagrahaṇe bādhakarūpaṃ śrutyuktaṃ jijñāsyabrahmaṇo lakṣaṇamāha sūtrakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1891: tasya lakṣaṇānyāha tānyanena sūtreṇa bhagavānāha“iti tattvapradīpokteḥ tacchabdādhyāhāreṇa bhāṣyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1893: anena pūrvatra vivakṣitabrahmajijñāsākṣepeṇeha pūrvapakṣotthānāt pūrvādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1897: tathāpi bhāṣyakārairuktatve 'pi sūtrakṛtānuktatvāt brahma kiṃ jīva uta viṣṇuriti bhavatyeva sandehaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1900: yadvā - “janmādyasya yata iti sūtre śrutamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ”/
GSP33bbdip11u:1903: tasya samāsārthaikadeśasya janmano guṇatvena viśeṣaṇatvena saṃvijñānāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1906: bhavati śrutamiti vā tadbrahmeti sūtrārtha ityabhipretya asya jagato janma ādipadokte
GSP33bbdip11u:1917: mokṣaṃ ca viṣṇutaścaiva jñātvā muktirna cānyathā //
GSP33bbdip11u:1925: nanu jagajjanmādikartṛtvaṃ yadi viṣṇvekaniṣṭhaṃ bhavettadā brahmaśabdena jīvagrahaṇe bādhakarūpaṃ syāt;
GSP33bbdip11u:1926: tasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatvameva kuto jñāyata ityata āha - 'utpatti'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1943: jijñāsyaṃ brahma viṣṇureva bhavet janmādikartṛtvāt ityanumāne hetvasiddhiṃ jijñāsyabrahmalakṣaṇasya
GSP33bbdip11u:1944: tatrānupalambhakṛtāsambhavaṃ vā nirākartuṃ jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ jijñāsye brahmaṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:1947: bhūtaśabdaḥ “astitvādbhūtanāmabhyaḥ sarvajīvebhya eva yat“iti gītātātparyanirṇayavacanājjīvavācī tadupalakṣitasarvajagatparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1948: tathā ca - 'imāni bhūtāni yato jāyante yena jātāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:1961: ya u tridhātu pṛthivīmuta dyāṃ eko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā //
GSP33bbdip11u:1963: caturbhissākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiḥ cakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīṃravīvipat //
GSP33bbdip11u:1965: lakṣaṇasyātivyāptiśaṅkāṃ uktānumānasya vyabhicāraśaṅkāṃ vā parihartuṃ spaṣṭārthatvātprathamaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1966: smṛtimupanyasya idānīṃ sṛṣṭyādikartṛtvaṃ pratyekamapi viṣṇvekaniṣṭhaṃ kimu sarvamiti
GSP33bbdip11u:1983: tathā ca - sa bṛhaccharīro mūlarūpī viṣṇuḥ 'nāmabhiśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1987: - deveṣu yaugiko 'yaṃ śabdaḥ - viśeṣeṇādhikān devān kimutānyān 'vṛttaṃ cakraṃ na';
GSP33bbdip11u:1991: aṣṭau vasavaḥ ekādaśa rudrāḥ viṣṇuvyatiriktaikādaśādityāḥ hiraṇyagarbheṇa saha daśa prajeśvarāḥ pradhānena pañcāśanmaruta iti navatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1997: ananto garuḍo vāyuḥ catvāro brahmaṇā saha //
GSP33bbdip11u:2000: paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvamanvaśnuvanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2001: na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto devamahimnaḥ paramantamāpa //
GSP33bbdip11u:2002: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāmativyāptiṃ viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatvoktyā smṛtyā cārthāt parihṛtāmapi sākṣādanyatra lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ pratipādayantyā śrutyā nirāha - 'paraḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2026: upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat janiṣyamāṇo na prāpsyatītyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2027: ata eva tattvapradīpe - “paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna /
GSP33bbdip11u:2029: ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo devatvaṃ paramasya vitse /
GSP33bbdip11u:2030: na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto devamahimnaḥ paramantamāpa /
GSP33bbdip11u:2031: udastabhnā nākamṛṣvaṃ bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubhaṃ pṛthivyāḥ“iti ṛgdvayamevameva vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2032: tathā hi - mātrāyāḥ paraḥ parimāṇātītaḥ tanvā vṛdhānaḥ tanvā vardhamānaḥ dehena pūrṇaḥ - itthaṃ bhāve tṛtīyā -
GSP33bbdip11u:2035: te mahitvaṃ mahimānaṃ nānubhavanti na prāpnuvanti ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2036: te tvadīyāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ prakṛteḥ rajasī rajoguṇakārye ubhe puṇyapāpe vayaṃ vidmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2039: tvameva mahimnaḥ mahimasamudāyasyāntaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śriyo vā mahimānamatiśayito hi viṣṇumahimā anyamahimnāṃ param antaṃ te mahimānaṃ na kañcidāpa
GSP33bbdip11u:2042: bṛhantaṃ pūrṇaṃ lokam udastabhnāḥ udastabhnaḥ uccairastambhayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2043: pṛthivyāḥ prathivyātmakasya brahmāṇḍasya prācīṃ kakubhaṃ diśaṃ indrasthāpanena dādhartha dhṛtavānasi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2045: yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhavanāni viśvā //
GSP33bbdip11u:2072: tathā ca - śivo jagajjanmādikartā sarvajñatvāt vyatirekeṇa yajñadattavat ityādyanumānāt viṣṇoḥ 'anye';
GSP33bbdip11u:2078: yathā vā “sarvendriyavivarjitatvādyartha uktaḥ“iti gītābhāṣyaprameyadīpe ādītyataḥ paraṃ śabdaśabdo 'dhyāhārya ityuktestatra yathā madhye 'dhyāhāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2079: yathā vā “puruṣādvadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu“iti mahābhāṣyavākye samāsamadhye teneti padādhyāhāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2081: tathā ca ṛgādirūpaṃ śāstraṃ ca tadekamasahāyaṃ ca jñaptiyonirjñaptikāraṇaṃ yasya vastunaḥ tattathoktaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāditisūtrārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2082: anena na jagatkāraṇamānumānikaṃ tasya śāstraikasamadhigamyatvāt dharmādivat ityanumānamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2085: tathā ca - anumānādanyeṣāṃ jagatkāraṇatāsādhanamayuktamiti na teṣu lakṣaṇasyātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2090: kāraṇasya śāstraikavedyatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - 'na'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2103: yadvā - sarvamanubhāvayatīti sarvānubhustaṃ ātmānaṃ sarvajagatkartāraṃ sarvasvāminaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2104: 'sāmparāye'; samyakparasyāyaḥ prāptiḥ samparāyaḥ sa eva sāmparāyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2108: tathā ca sadāgamatadarthājñānī vedaviruddhajñānī vā 'na manute'; na jānāti,
GSP33bbdip11u:2110: kintu vedavideva jānāti veda eva pramāpayatīti prathamaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2111: puruṣo jagatkartā ā aupaniṣadaḥ upaniṣadekasamadhigamya ityanyaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2119: tathā caivamādiśrutibhyaḥ kāraṇasya śāstraikayonitvāvagamāt nāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2124: aupaniṣadasyāpi kāraṇasyānumānena siddhiḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2129: tathā ca - na tenānyasya jagatkartṛtāsādhanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2131: ityadhikaraṇe svātantryādihetunā viṣṇoḥ pūrṇatvādisiddhyaṅgīkārādityata uktam - 'niyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2134: tathā ca - anumānatvādeva na tasya svātantryeṇādṛṣṭārthaniścāyakatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2138: tacca na svātantryādihetāvasti śrutisāhāyyarahitatvena svatantratvānna pramāṇatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2155: uktaṃ hi gītābhāṣye - “sa niścayena yoktavyaḥ yoktavya eva bubhūṣuṇetyarthaḥ“iti uktaṃ hi prameyadīpikāyām “ayogavyavacchede niścayaśabdaḥ“iti
GSP33bbdip11u:2166: evaṃ śrutismṛtisahāyo yastarkaḥ viṣṇuḥ svatantraḥ pūrṇatvāditi samavyāptikānumānaṃ so 'pi pramāṇapadavīṃ gacchedityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2177: upakramopasaṃhārāvirodhena tadaikarūpyeṇa-liṅgāntarasyāpyupalakṣaṇametat - tathā ca - upakramāditātparyaliṅgaiḥ atra tātparyaviṣayārtho 'yameva bhavedityādyaṃ yat 'ūhanaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2181: śrutismṛtisahāyarahitaṃ tannirapekṣaṃ cetanatvādi tarkaṃ tu varjayet,
GSP33bbdip11u:2191: na kevalaṃ śrutyādisāhityahīnānumānasya prāmāṇyābhāve sādhaka sadbhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2192: api tu tatprāmāṇyābhyupagame bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha - 'śakyatvāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2201: tasmānna sā śaktimatī vināgamamudīkṣitum // iti vārāhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:2220: nanvatīndriyārthābhāvena pratyakṣetarasyāprāmāṇyātkathaṃ śāstrādīśvarasiddhiriti nāstikyavādaṃ mokṣadharmavacanena nirācaṣṭe - reta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2221: reta ityādiprathamaikavacanāntānāṃ padānāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāṇamiti padenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2224: atīndriyārthasattve anumānādiprāmāṇye ca pramāṇaṃ pramāpakaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:2225: bhāṣyakārīyadvitīyetiśabdasya evaṃ mokṣadharmavacanātpratītairhetubhirnāstikyavādo na yujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2231: yadvā - nyāyadīpikoktarītyā - āstikyaṃ dharmādāvastyanena prayojanamiti bhāvo buddhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2236: mṛtaśarīre siktasya retasaḥ śarīrākāraṇatvena yadadhiṣṭhite śarīre siktaṃ retaḥ śarīrātmanā pariṇamati tajjīvasiddhiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:2237: vandhyādisarvaśarīre siktasya retasaḥ kāryākaratvena yatpreritaṃ retaḥ kāryakaraṃ tadīśvarādṛṣṭasiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2267: na ca tanmṛtaśarīre pātrāntare vā nihitaṃ pacyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2273: tathā ca - maraṇena dehasya pṛthivyādipañcabhūteṣu layo bhavati,
GSP33bbdip11u:2284: tathā ca svādhyāyabrahmacaryādirūpātyutkaṭatapaādiphalasya tejassvitvādeḥ pratyakṣata eva darśanācca na nāstikyavādo yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2289: tarhi pāśupatādiśāstreṇa rudrāderjagatkāraṇatvasiddhiḥ syādityata āha - ṛgiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2297: ato 'nyo granthavistāro naiva śāstraṃ kuvartma tat //
GSP33bbdip11u:2319: ityārabhya vedapañcarātrayoraikyābhiprāyeṇa pañcarātrasyaiva prāmāṇyamuktamitareṣāṃ bhinnamatatvaṃ pradarśya mokṣadharmeṣvapi //
GSP33bbdip11u:2328: ityuttaravākyena sāṅkhyādiṣu prakṛteṣvapi tatparityāgena pañcarātrasyaiva prāmāṇyarūpamādhikyamuktaṃ yato 'taḥ pāśupatādikaṃ kuvartma amānameveti
GSP33bbdip11u:2342: tathā ca pañcarātrasya vedasamānārthatvena tatprāmāṇyoktau vedaprāmāṇyamevoktaṃ bhavatīti na tasyāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2343: na caikyābhiprāyaḥ kutaḥ kalpyata iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2346: kapilo vāsudevākhyaḥ tantraṃ sāṅkhyaṃ jagāda ha /
GSP33bbdip11u:2356: ata eva tattvapradīpe - mokṣadharmeṣviti bahuvacanaṃ dharmabhedādityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2363: viruddhanāmapi matānāṃ na sarveṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sambhavati vastuno bahurūpatvābhāvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:2365: tatra kasya prāmāṇyaṃ kasya vāprāmāṇyamiti punaryudhiṣṭhirajanamejayahārdapraśnottaramāha bhīṣmo vaiśampāyanaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2366: “sāṅkhyasya vaktā kapilaḥ“ityārabhya “pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya“ityanena jñāneṣu jñānasādhaneṣu etatpañcarātram /
GSP33bbdip11u:2367: abhiprāyastu paramāptatamena nārāyaṇena sarvasya pañcarātrasya kṛtatvātprāmāṇyaṃ tāvatsiddham,
GSP33bbdip11u:2371: upalakṣaṇāmaṅgīkṛtyaikavākyatāyāṃ ca svīkṛtāyāṃ vedapañcarātrayoreva prāmāṇayaṃ siddhyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2374: evaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāya yatpareṇoktaṃ śāstrasya yoniriti tadayuktamiti bhāvena svābhimatārthaṃ darśayati - śāstramiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2375: kāraṇārthakena yoniśabdena yogyatayā jñaptessambandhe pramāṇamiti paryavasyatītyabhiprāyeṇa 'yoniḥ pramāṇam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2381: tathā ca - śāstraṃ yoniḥ pramāṇaṃ yasya tacchāstrayonītyeva śāstrayonipadārtho brahma,
GSP33bbdip11u:2390: tasya lakṣaṇatvasiddhaye viṣṇoreva jagatkāraṇatvena śāstragamyatvaṃ netareṣāmapīti samarthyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2398: śrutitātparyārthājñānibhirāpātataḥ jñāyamānamapi na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ kintu 'itareṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2401: nanu pratītyāderajñānamūlatvādikaṃ parikalpyānyeṣāṃ kāraṇatayā śāstrayonitvāgrahaṇe ko heturiti pṛcchati - kuta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2407: anvīyate svārthena sambadhyate tatparatayā jñāyate śāstraṃ śabdo vānenetyanvayaḥ upapattyāditātparyaliṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2412: atra vākye śrutyādiṣaṭkamapyādipadena grāhyamiti hi tasyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2415: śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2418: uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyām “upakramādīnāṃ tātparyaliṅgatvameteṣāṃ punarartha eveti viśeṣajñāpanārtho yogavibhāgaḥ“iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2419: na caivam “atra śrutyādiṣaṭkaṃ ca grāhyam“iti ṭīkāyāṃ tātparyagrāhakeṣvantarbhāvoktirayukteti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2423: ityādau śrutiliṅgādibhirāgamārthaniraṇayadarśanena teṣāmapi anvīyate śaktirūpasambandhavattayā jñāyate padajātamebhiritivyutpattyā anvayaśabdārthatvaucityāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2424: na copakramopasaṃhārābhyāsāpūrvatāphalārthavādopapattayaḥ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyāśca tātparyaliṅgānīti jñānapādīyasudhāvirodha iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2426: ata eva candrikāyāmupakramādipramāṇakaḥ śaktitātparyalakṣaṇassambandhaḥ samanvaya ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2429: anenātra bṛhatsaṃhitāvacanodāharaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇasya śrutirliṅgamiti vacanasyopalakṣakamiti sūcitam / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2434: kāni tānyupapattyādīni kutra ca liṅgānītyata āha - uktaṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2460: smṛterupakramāditve 'pi virodhe uttarottaraprābalyasūcanāya bhāṣye upapattyādīti vyatyasyoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2462: yadvā - etaccopakramādi svārthe śabdātmakamapi idametatparam abādhe satyetadupakramatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2464: upapattistu yathāgnyādirūpasvarthe tathā tātparye 'pi ayametattātparyaviṣayaḥ upapannatvāt iti prakāreṇa liṅgarūpeti pṛthaguktiḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2483: liṅgairiti tṛtīyayā nirūpyamāṇe iti saptamīprayoge ca upakramādikaṃ tātparyahetuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2484: tātparyaṃ ca śāstrapramāṇakatve heturiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2497: nanu karmavidhānādirūpaśāstrasya kathaṃ brahmaparatetyāśaṅkāṃ bhagavadvākyena pratiṣedhati - māmiti/
GSP33bbdip11u:2503: tathā ca “vasante vasante” ityādi karmavidhātrī śrutiḥ 'mām';
GSP33bbdip11u:2509: catvāri vākparimitā padāni tāni vidurbrāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2510: guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti // (ṛ. 1-164-45.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2511: iti śrutyā yā vāgvaktṛttvānnimittādvākbdito hariḥ tasyā yāni sthānāpekṣayā 'parimitāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:2513: vāsudevādirūpāṇi tāni ye manīṣiṇaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ta eva viduḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2514: tatra vāco hṛdayaguhāyāṃ nihitāni vāsudevāditrīṇi rūpāṇi 'manuṣyāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2521: tathā ca “niṣedhabuddhiviṣayamapriyaṃ hi hareḥ smṛtam“iti bhāgavatatātparyokteḥ surāpānādikaṃ madaprītisādhanatvāt niṣidhyate ityapriyadvārā 'na surāṃ pibet';
GSP33bbdip11u:2523: athavā - ahamapriyādapohyaḥ mamāprītikarātsurāpānaśabditāt “surā harerguṇā me syuḥ“iti cintanāttapadapekṣya apohyo niṣedhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2524: taduktaṃ bhāgavatatātparye - vidhirūpatvena kalpanaṃ vikalpaḥ catvāri vāgityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2528: ucyate sarvavedeṣu tacca veda sa eva hi // iti / tathā -
GSP33bbdip11u:2529: surā harerguṇāḥ proktāste me syuriti cintanam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2531: tattvapradīpe tu - 'dve vā va brahmaṇo rūpe';
GSP33bbdip11u:2532: iti vikalpya vividhaṃ kalpayitvā 'tatra yassa ātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2536: ṭīkākṛtpakṣe tu vikalpyaśabdassamāsāntargato vyasto veti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2540: tathā ca hyevaṃbhūtāyā vidhiniṣedhādirūpāyā anyaparatvena pratītāyāścāsyāśśruteriti 'māṃ vidhatte';
GSP33bbdip11u:2544: ko 'pi viśeṣataḥ prāyaḥ na veda na jānātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2545: bhāgavata ityanantaraṃ tadeva śāstragamyamityuktatvāt na kathamitiśaṅkāvakāśa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ // 4 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2551: atrādhikaraṇe saṃśabdoktaṃ vācyatvaṃ kārtsnyaṃ cākṣipya samādhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2557: pūrvasūtre tacchabdoktaṃ brahmaśabdagocaraṃ śāstroktaṃ kāraṇaṃ na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2562: kutaḥ? yato na tadgocaraṃ jñānaviṣayaḥ na,
GSP33bbdip11u:2566: 'yato vācaḥ'; iti vākye avācyatvasya 'aprāpya manasā saha';
GSP33bbdip11u:2568: “trayī na śrutigocarā“ityatra gocaraśabdasya viśeṣyaliṅgatayā prayogāt 'na tacchabdagocaram'; iti sādhu /
GSP33bbdip11u:2569: sudhāyāṃ tu śabdānāṃ gavāṃ jñānānāṃ caraścaraṇaṃ vṛttiryasmin tacchabdagocaramiti
GSP33bbdip11u:2576: taṃ brahmaṇa ānandaṃ vidvānna bibheti ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2582: na vidyate śabdo guṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ vā yasmiṃstattathoktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2584: 'asparśaṃ'; sparśaguṇaśūnyaṃ tata eva sparśaliṅgāviṣayaḥ tadbhinnaṃ ca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2600: 'yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ... yacchrotreṇa na śruṇoti yena śrotramidaṃ śrutam'
GSP33bbdip11u:2606: yenedaṃ śrotraṃ śrutaṃ tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2617: tathā ca atra sūtrakāraḥ iti pūrvapakṣyuktaṃ śrutitātparyāparijñānaprāptaṃ brahmaṇo 'vācyatvaṃ neti niṣedhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2621: na vidyate śabdo vācako yasya tadaśabdam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2632: īkṣaṇīyatvāt jñānaviṣayatvādityarthaḥ ityāśayena sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2634: atra “yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇaumityanenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta sa tejasi
GSP33bbdip11u:2635: sūrye sampanno yathā pādodarastavacā vinirmucyate evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmuktaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2636: sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam“iti pūrvavākye prakṛto yaḥ akārokāramakārākhyāṃśatrayayuktapraṇavoktaprakāreṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:2638: satyākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāptaḥ praṇavopāsako jīvaḥ saḥ 'jīvaghanāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:2674: tathāpi na tadanyathānupapattyā tasya vācyatvaṃ vācyaṃ pratyakṣādināpīkṣaṇīyatvopapatterityata āha - aupaniṣadatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2681: tathā ca śrutismṛtisāhāyyarahitapratyakṣādyavedyatvaviśiṣṭekṣaṇīyatvānyathānupapattyā brahmaṇo vācyatvaṃ siddhyatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2683: yojanā tu brahmaṇaśrutiṣūktaṃ īkṣaṇaṃ pramāṇenaiva hi bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:2685: vacanetarapramāṇenekṣaṇaṃ sambhavati aupaniṣadatvāt vacanenaiva bhavadīkṣaṇaṃ nāvacanena vacanavṛttyanyalakṣaṇādinā sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2688: avacanatvenāvācyatvena nimittena ataḥ pariśeṣādīkṣaṇaṃ vācyatvameva sādhayatīti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2689: 'sarve vedā yatpadamāmanti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:2693: iti yuktitaḥ śruteḥ prābalyokterityataḥ sautro heturāgamopalakṣaka iti bhāvena vācyatve śrutismṛtī cāha - sarva iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:2715: ityavadhāraṇopapattaye mukhyatayā vedyatvasya vivakṣaṇīyatvāt tasya ca vācyatvaṃ vināyogātsarvaśabdalakṣaṇāyāścāsambhavādvācyatvamevābhyāṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2729: avācyatvādivyapadeśo yujyata iti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2732: 'avacanena'; ityasya tu sākalyena vacanamantareṇetyartha ityuktaṃ bhavati / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2733: na tadīdṛgiti jñeyaṃ na vācyaṃ na ca tarkyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2734: paśyanto 'pi na paśyanti mero rūpaṃ vipaścitaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:2736: nanvaprasiddhinimittako 'vācyatvādivyapadeśaḥ kva dṛṣṭa ityata āha - na taditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2748: tathā ca yathā merurūpe aprasiddhinimittakāvācyatvādivyapadeśastathā brahmaṇyapīti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2754: api tu smṛtisiddhā ceti bhāvenāha - aprasiddheriti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2758: evamaprasiddhiprasiddhibhyāṃ tat atarkyam anumeyaṃ ca ajñeyaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānipratyakṣagamyaṃ ca 'smṛtaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2764: ityādiśrutīnāṃ yuktyādibalādarthāntaropapatterna tadbalācchabdāvācyaṃ brahmeti sūtraṃ vyākhyāyāpavyākhyāṃ pratyākhyāti - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2771: iti jagatkāraṇasyekṣaṇakartṛtvaśravaṇātpradhānasya cācetanatvena tadasambhavāditi sāṅkhyamatanirākaraṇaparatayā vyākhyāne prathamapratijñāyāṃ hetūkṛtam 'aśabdatvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2780: yadvā - tattvapradīparītyā māyinā sāṅkhyaṃ prati hetutvenopanyastamaśabdatvaṃ māyītarasya sāṅkhyasya na siddhaṃ nāpi sāṅkhyetaramāyisiddhamuktahetubhyāmeva
GSP33bbdip11u:2786: tathā ca hetudvayamapi svapakṣapratikūlamiti na paravyākhyā yukteti bhāvaḥ tattvapradīpe tu 'naca';
GSP33bbdip11u:2788: māyisiddhamaśabdatvaṃ na śrutyarthaḥ uktanyāyena brahmaṇo vācyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2790: avācyatvaṃ brahmaṇa itarasya māyino 'pi na siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:2791: brahmaṇi vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgāt iti dvedhā vyākhyāyaparakṛtavyākhyāpratyākhyānāya paroktahetoṣṭīkārītyāsiddhyuktiparatayāpi vyākhyātam // 5
GSP33bbdip11u:2793: īkṣaṇīyatvasya hetorvyadhikaraṇāsiddhimākṣipya samādhātuṃ sūtram - 'oṃ gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2796: sattvādiguṇabaddho jīva evātastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syānna nirguṇaḥ paramātmeti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2800: na ca gauṇa ātmā dṛśyo vācyaśca na nirguṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2805: jīvākhyo gauṇa eva atastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syāt 'na nirguṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2809: ato na sa vācyaḥ iti codyaṃ na yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2812: iti vākye īkṣaṇīye tasmin ātmaśabdaśravaṇāddṛśyo nirguṇa eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:2813: ata evekṣatyā liṅgena vācyo 'pi sa eva bhavediti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2814: yadyapi sudhāyāṃ gauṇapadaṃ māyāśabalitaiśvaryādidharmayuktasaguṇabrahmaparatayā vyākhyātaṃ tathāpi pūrvapakṣiṇo māyāśabalitaṃ vā guṇabaddhā jīvā vā dṛśyā vācyāśca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2821: nanvātmaśabdasadbhāve kuto 'yaṃ nirguṇo na gauṇa ityata āha - ya iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2824: sattvādibhiḥ śūnyaḥ yaśca dukhakhādidoṣarahitaḥ yaśca heyopādeyarahitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2833: ya etadviruddhasvabhāvavān so 'nātmeti satāṃ mataṃ sammatamitythaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2845: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe ātmā caivānātmā ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2846: tatra yaḥ sa ātmā sa nityaḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo nirguṇaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2850: 'brahmaṇaḥ'; parabrahmaṇaḥ rūpaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca rūpe /
GSP33bbdip11u:2851: tatrādyo rūpaśabdaḥ svarūpaparaḥ dvitīyo rūpyate jñāyate brahmākhyamiti vyutpattyā pratimāparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2866: evaṃ prathamoddiṣṭātmaśabdārthaṃ lakṣaṇamukhena pradarśya athānātmānamuktalakṣaṇavyatirekamukhena darśayati - atheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2871: 'brāhmaṇam'; ityanantaraṃ yato nirguṇasya viṣṇorevātmatvaṃ vaktīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2875: nanūpacāreṇāpyātmaśabdasya gauṇe prayogasadbhāvātsa eva śrutyukto dṛśya ātmā kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2876: 'mukhye'; ātmapadamukhyārthe nirguṇe dṛśyatayekṣatiśrutipratipādye sambhavati sati amukhyārthagauṇagrahaṇaṃ na yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2881: nanu ātmaśabdo mukhyata eva gauṇātmaparaḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2883: tatrātmaśabdo nirguṇe viṣṇau mukhyo jīveṣvamukhya ityanukteḥ ātmanātmaśabdayoścetanācetanaviṣayatvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2888: duḥkhādidoṣasyaupādhikatvena jīvasyāpi svabhāvato nirdeṣatayā śruteḥ svabhāvaviṣayatvopapatterityāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati - oṃ tanniṣṭhasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2894: tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto 'yamātmā na gauṇa ityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkhyāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2901: yasyānuvittaḥ pratibuddha ātmā asmin sandohe gahane praviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2902: sa viśvakṛtsa hi sarvasya kartā tasya lokaḥ sa u loka eva
GSP33bbdip11u:2905: asiddhiśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ ko 'sāvātmaniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśa ityatastaṃ darśayati - yasyeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2914: sanduhyate puruṣārtho aneneti vā kāryakāraṇasaṅkhātarūpatvādvā bhūtasamudāyarūpatvādvā sandohanāmake madhyadehe sthite 'gahane';
GSP33bbdip11u:2926: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa hi paramātmā prasannaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ sarvamasya jñāninaḥ kāryaṃ karotītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2936: asya yata ityupadiśyate ato 'na gauṇa ātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2938: sūtrasya tu na gauṇa ātmaśabda iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2942: ātmaśabdo viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ na jīveṣvityatra na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasyetyādinoktamanumānaṃ mānam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2943: kintu sūtrakṛdabhipretāḥ spaṣṭaśrutismṛtayaśceti bhāvena tāṃ tāścāha - ayamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2951: cetanastu dvidhā prokto jīva ātmeti ca prabho /
GSP33bbdip11u:2960: advayaṃ samādhikaśūnyaṃ jñānasvarūpaṃ yattattvaṃ vadanti jñāninaḥ tat deśakālādiṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:2971: tathā ca - anasūyākhyā atribhāryā atreḥ sakāśāt 'ātmeśabrahmasambhavān';
GSP33bbdip11u:2972: ātmā viṣṇurīśorudraḥ brahmā caturmukhaḥ ātmā ceśaśca brahmā ca te tathoktāḥ taissaha bhavantītyātmeśabrahmasambhavāḥ tān 'akalmaṣān';
GSP33bbdip11u:2973: apāpān yo dattaḥ durvāsāḥ somaścaitān putrān 'jajñe';
GSP33bbdip11u:2976: te ca ātmeśabrahmasambhavā iti vipariṇāmena vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2977: atra brahmāveśena sahotpanne candre niruktasambhavaśabdo mukhyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2981: tathāpyanuvyākhyāne evaṃ paṭhitatvāttathaiva sudhāyāṃ vyākhyātatvāttadanyakalpīyaṃ pāṭhāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2988: tathā ca - 'jīvāḥ brahmādayaḥ proktāḥ ātmā tu';
GSP33bbdip11u:3002: ātmajñānānmokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto netareṣāmātmatvaṃ teṣāmapi mokṣadātṛtvasambhavādityata āha - saguṇā iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3011: tanniścayastu kuta ityata āha - paro hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3023: yuktyantareṇātmaśabdādito na gauṇa ityāha sūtrakṛt - heyatveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3024: atra heyatvaṃ nāma mokṣārthaṃ prādhānyena jñeyatvenāvihitatvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3025: tathā ca - na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3029: jīvasya ca “anyā vāco vimuñcatha“iti mumukṣubhirheyatvavacanācceti sūtravṛttimabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3046: sautranaño vyatyāsena anvayamabhipretya samucceyāntaramāha - asya viṣṇoraheyatveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3051: tathā ca - ātmaśabdādīkṣatiśrutyukto 'pi nirguṇa eveti siddham/
GSP33bbdip11u:3058: sa devī bahudhā bhūtvā nirguṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3068: tattvapradīparītyā amuṣmādidaṃ saṅkhyāmātreṇodacyate ekameva bahusaṅkhyaṃ bhavati viśeṣādeveti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3102: gauṇa eva kiṃ na syādityastatra sautraṃ hetuṃ sāvadhāraṇasvaśabdāvṛttyā yojayati - svasyaiveti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3109: tathā ca pūrṇamiti śrutau svāpyayapadopalakṣitapūrṇatvasya vacanāt svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanācca,
GSP33bbdip11u:3110: sa iti spaṣṭaśrutāvapi ātmanyeva vilāpayīti svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3111: tasya ca nirguṇahariniṣṭhatāyāḥ smṛtau vacanācca ayaṃ nirguṇa eva na gauṇa iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3112: vācyatve svāpyayasya sākṣāddhetutvābhāvāt sūtre bhāṣye ca caśabdābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3114: tathāpyasya vācyatve sākṣadahetutvāttatra hetvantarasya jñāpakacaśabdo nānuvartanīyaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip11u:3115: śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhṛtahetau caśabdāvaśyaṃbhāvāt kathaṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3118: tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ - na kevalaṃ nirguṇaviṣṇvākhyaṃ brahma īkṣaṇīyatvādvācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3126: yadyayaṃ svāpyayavān gauṇaḥ tarhyayaṃ nirguṇaścobhau pralaye 'nyatra layahīnau tiṣṭhataḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3128: nādyaḥ “idaṃ vā agne naiva kiñca nāsīt“(tai.brā. 2-2-9-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3133: tathā ca nirguṇasya saguṇe layo vācyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3134: sa ca na sambhavatītyāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3140: tasmānnirguṇasya svasminneva layo vācya ityato 'yamananyalīno nirguṇa eveti tasyaiva śrutyuktatvādvācyatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3142: na tu mukhyāsambhave gauṇāśrayaṇādityatreva nirguṇo 'yamityatreva vā mukhyārthaguṇahīnaviṣaya iti sūcanāya nirguṇasyeti vaktavyatve 'pi nirdeṣasyetyuktam
GSP33bbdip11u:3145: sarve vedā yuktayaḥ supramāṇā brāhmaṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ tvekameva /
GSP33bbdip11u:3146: prakāśayante na virodhaḥ kutaścidvedeṣu sarveṣu tathetihāse //
GSP33bbdip11u:3148: nanvastu nirguṇasya viṣṇorvācyatvopapattau satyāṃ kāraṇatvena śāstragamyatvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3164: kuto netyatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - gatīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3165: uttarasūtrapadākarṣaṇena sarvādhikārisādhāraṇaṃ gatisāmānyasya śrutatvāditi yojanāmabhipretya asiddhiparihārāya tatsūtrasūcitāṃ śrutimāha - sarva iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3169: suṣṭhu pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānantaraṃ mūlabhūtaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ 'yuktayaḥ'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:3182: kaścidapi viṣayakṛto vā prakārakṛto vā 'virodho na';
GSP33bbdip11u:3189: “na hyekatra jñānānandādikamuktvānyatrājñānādirūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ucyate“iti tattvapradīpokteḥ kathyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3190: na tu viṣamatvamiti vā svayameva sākṣānna tvanyamukheneti vā evaśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3192: iti śrutyā svayameva sākṣādgateḥ sarvaśākhotpādyajñānasya sāmānyāt ekavidhatvokteḥ na kāsucicchākhāsu anyathocyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3193: atra bhinnaviṣayaprakārakeṣvapi jñāneṣu jñānatvena sāmyasattvātsāmyādityuktau viṣayaprakāraikyaṃ na siddhyatīti sāmānyāt samānatvāt ekavidhatvāt ityuktaṃ sūtre /
GSP33bbdip11u:3201: itaśca nirguṇaṃ brahma vācyamityāha sūtrakṛt - śrutatvācceti/
GSP33bbdip11u:3204: tathā ca tadviṣṇvākhyaṃ nirguṇaṃ na kevalamīkṣatyādibhiḥ nāśabdaṃ śabdavācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3206: svavācakanāmnā sākṣāduktatvāccetyartha ityāśayena sūtropāttaśrutiṃ paṭhati - eka iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3211: ca deśataḥ kālato guṇataśca sarvaṃ vyāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3214: sarvaprāṇināṃ antaḥsthitvā ā samyak tanniyantā ca mātā ceti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3222: īkṣaṇaṃ ca na prākṛtaṃ kintu caitanyasvarūpamityāha - 'cetā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3224: 'kevalo'; jaḍāmiśraḥ samābhyadhikaśūnya iti vā “kevalaṃ tādṛśābhāvāt“iti dvitīyatātparyokteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3230: “atra vācyatvaṃ pratipādayatsūtraṃ tadupāttaśrutyudāharaṇapūrvakaṃ paṭhati - eka iti“iti kvacitkaṭīkāpāṭhānusāreṇa bhāṣye kvacit śrutipāṭhānantaraṃ sūtrapāṭho dṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3232: śrutatve 'pyaśabdaḥ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvaśaṅkāyāmāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3238: nanu aśabdasyāpi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇayā śrutatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3241: kutaḥ? yato 'vācyasya vastuno lakṣyatvamaprasiddham ata iti vyāptiparatvenāpīdaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3245: brahmaṇo lakṣaṇāyāḥ vedapadalakṣyatvasyāyukteḥ vipratipannaṃ na lakṣyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3247: tathā ca - nāsmābhiḥ kevalāvācyatvena lakṣyatvābhāvaḥ sādhyate yena tīrādau vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayeta,
GSP33bbdip11u:3253: ato na vyabhicāra iti yuktivirodho duṣparihara iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3254: nanu lakṣyatvābhāvavati pravāhādau hetvabhāvādasādhāraṇamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:3261: athādhyāyapādayorupodghātatvena pīṭharūpāyāmasyāṃ pañcādhikaraṇyaṃ brahmasvarūpanarūpaṇe anavaśeṣātkimadhyāyātmakaśeṣagranthenetyata āha - tameveti
GSP33bbdip11u:3264: tathā ca - tathāpi prakaṭanaṃ vinādhyāyākhyaśeṣagranthasya kṛtyāntarābhāve 'pi 'tameva';
GSP33bbdip11u:3266: upakramādiliṅgajñāpyaṃ samyagvacanavṛttyā sarvaśāstrīyavacanānāṃ harau nirūpaṇaṃ tatparatvaṃ 'prakaṭayati';
GSP33bbdip11u:3267: prativākyagrahaṇena taddhetūpanyāsādinā prapañcayati “ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt“ityādinā anena prathamenādhyāyena sūtrakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3273: yathopakramādikaṃ tajjñāpyaṃ tātparyaṃ ca samanvayaśabdārthaḥ tathā bhāṣyaṃ yojitam adhastāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3284: caturthapāde na samanvayaḥ kriyata iti paramatanirāsāya 'samastena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3293: prāyeṇānyatraprasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ paramātmani samanvayaḥ pradarśyate 'smin pāde /
GSP33bbdip11u:3295: tarhi adhyāyasyaikārthatvāt pādabhedaḥ kiṃ nibandhana ityataḥ samanvetavyabhedāt samanvaye 'pyavāntarabheda iti bhāvena prathamādhyāprathamapādapratipādyaṃ darśayati - prāyeṇeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3299: śrutyādito lokato vādmapātato rūḍhatvena pratīyamānānāṃ nāmātmakānāṃ 'śabdānāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3305: tattvapradīpe tu eka eva bhāṣye prāyeṇeti śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3306: tasyaivottaratrāpi sambandha ityāśayena “prāyeṇānyatra prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāmiti ca sambandhaḥ“ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3307: tathā - ānandamayādhikaraṇe liṅgavicārattadapi prāyeṇeti vyāvartyamiti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3308: yadvā - ṭīkāyāmapyāvṛttyabhiprāyeṇaikasyaiva punaruttaratrāpi anvayapradarśanāya pratīkagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti na granthavairūpyaṃ kalpyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3309: ata eva tattvapradīpānusāreṇa “ānandamayanāmnaḥ iti ṭīkāyāmānandamayanāmaśbadaḥ ānandādināmaparo vā yojyaḥ“ityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:3311: 'anyathā'; prathame spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ śabdānāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyayoraspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3313: caturthapāde tu pradhānasyāśābdatvoktirityevaṃ rūpo 'smaduktādanyaprakāreṇa pādārtho na vācyaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3326: tathāpi ānandamayasya viṣṇutvasamarthane kā pūrvasaṅgatirityato 'vyavahitapūrvādhikaraṇenaiva saṅgatirvaktavyeti niyamābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3327: vyavahitapūrveṇa jijñāsādhikaraṇena tadviṣayeṇa ca asyānantaryalakṣaṇalakṣitāmākṣepikīṃ saṅgatiṃ tāvaddarśayati - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3335: nanu brahmaṇo 'vayavatvoktāvapi kimarthamānandamayasya viṣṇutvasamarthanamityata āha - na hīti/
GSP33bbdip11u:3342: iti śrutau jijñāsyatayoktaṃ brahma ānandamayākhyasya kasyacidavayavarūpaṃ 'pratīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:3351: ataḥ śaṅkārūpasaṅgatisadbhāvāt atrānandamayasya viṣṇvanyatvapakṣe brahmajijñāsākṣepāt viṣṇutvapakṣe ca tatsamādhānāt evaṃ ca pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayoḥ phalasadbhāvācca 'ato';
GSP33bbdip11u:3388: tadevānandamayākhyasya jīvaśarīrasya parairanyairupakartṛbhiḥ prāpyatvāt priyanāmakamupakārajanyavaiṣayikasukhākhyaṃ yacchiraḥ tatsthaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3398: pratiṣṭhati gacchati loka ābhyāmiti vyutpattyā pratiṣṭhāpadokto yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tadbrahma 'brahmasṛṣṭyā tu bṛṃhayet';
GSP33bbdip11u:3400: sa evānandamayākhyajīvaśarīrasya yat pucchaṃ yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tatsthite brahmākhye
GSP33bbdip11u:3405: bhūtāḥ ye priyādayaḥ te viṣṇvabhinnāḥ ye cānandamayādijīvakośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā iti dvividhāḥ priyādaya ityuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:3406: yathoktaṃ candrikāyām - ye jīvābhimanyamānānandamayādikośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3408: ye ca bhagavato 'vayavāḥ priyādayo na te pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā kintvabhinnā iti jīvasvarūpasyānandasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3411: ityudāhariṣyamāṇavacanaparyālocanayādmanandamayākhyo nārāyaṇaḥ punarnārāyaṇādirūpeṇa pañcadhā bhinnaḥ śiraḥprabhṛtyavayavātmanā tiṣṭhatīti pratīyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3416: dehasthavāyusaṃsthaṃ ca brahma sṛṣṭyā tu bṛṃhayet // iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3424: iti taittirīyachāndogyabhāṣyayoruktatvātparaprāpyasukhasāmānyavācakena prākṛtaṃ sukhaṃ grāhyamiti sūcitam“iti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3429: eteṣu pañcasu dehākhyakośeṣu tattacchabdavācyāni puruṣākārāṇi aniruddhapradyumnasaṅkarṣaṇavāsudevanārāyaṇarūpāṇi dehadehibhāvena vartanta iti
GSP33bbdip11u:3431: na hyavayavinaṃ vinā avayavamātrasya jñeyatetyata āha // -
GSP33bbdip11u:3434: evaṃ saṅgatiṃ phalaṃ coktvā viṣayasaṃśayau darśayati - ānandamaya iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3446: brahmaśabdasya anyatrāpi vṛtteḥ kathaṃ tena caturmukhasyānandamayatvaniśca ityato yuktyantaramāha - śateti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3457: prāptirityasyānukarṣaṇārtho vā tathā ca - rudrasya cānandamayatvaprāptiḥ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3460: ityānandamayasya sūrye sthiteḥ uktatvādrudrasya ca sūryādyaṣṭaśarīratvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3461: tathā ca - rūdraliṅgasya ānandamaye śrutatvāt ānandamayo rudra evepi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3463: sūryo jalaṃ mahī vahnirvāyurākāśa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3477: ānandamaye śrutasya brahmaśabdasya 'mama yonirmahadbrahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmyaham';
GSP33bbdip11u:3480: tathā ca mahat brahmaśabdavācyā lakṣmīḥ mama yoniḥ garbhādhānārthaṃ bhāryā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3481: tasmin brahmaṇi prakṛtau ahaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi dadha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3483: kathaṃ sāvakāśena brahmaśabdena prakṛterānandamayatvaniścaya ityato hetvantaramāha - 'bahubhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3501: kuto brahmaśabdasya jīvavācitvamityata uktam - bṛha jātīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3516: ata eva tattvapradīpe - “brahmādiryasya devatāsaṅghasya“ityapi brahmādirityasya vigraho darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3518: atha indrādīnāṃ “brahmā śivaḥ sureśādyāḥ“iti vacanoktakrameṇa kṣaradevoktyanantaramakṣarāyāḥ prakṛteruktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3526: tathāpi atra ye ānandamayaśabdenocyante na te hiraṇyagarbhādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3530: anenodāhṛtānandamaya iti sūtrapratijñābhāgasya saṅgatyarthamanvayārthaṃ samanvayasūtrodāhṛto vidheyasamarpakaḥ 'tattu';
GSP33bbdip11u:3532: kuta ānandamayo viṣṇurevetyataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - tadeveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3533: ityādiṣu vākyeṣu tasminviṣṇāveva prasiddhasya mukhyārthatvenoktasya brahmaśabdasya tasminnānandamaye ānandamayaṃ pratyudāhṛte 'asanneva';
GSP33bbdip11u:3537: aprayojakatvaśaṅkāvāraṇāya brahmaśabdasyānyatra niravakāśatvajñāpanāya tasmin prasiddheti eveti coktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:3563: ityādau brahmaśabdasteṣu kathamiṣyata ityata āha - kvacidanyatreṣṭo 'pi brahmaśabdaḥ 'upacāreṇa';
GSP33bbdip11u:3567: madhye ātmapadopetasādhāraṇasmṛtyupādānanimittaṃ tu abhyāsādityasya 'anyontara ātmā'; (tai. u. 2-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3568: ityādau brahmavācakātmaśabdābhyāsādityapyartho varṇanīya iti jñāpanamityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:3570: iti vyāsasmṛtivākyaṃ tu 'buddhyāvihiṃsan puṣpairvā praṇavena samarcayet';
GSP33bbdip11u:3572: atra hi vāsudevātmakaṃ brahmetyāderbhagavān brahmeti pratīyate iti nyāyadīpokteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3575: manasā samarcayedityanena yatīnāṃ mānasapūjocyate puṣpādyairvā samarcayet ityanena kāyikapūjā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3581: aṣṭākṣareṇa vā samarcayedityanena vācikapūjocyate iti jñātavyam / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3582: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt / BBs_1,1.13 /
GSP33bbdip11u:3610: kuta ityataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - pracureti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3619: mayaḍityākhyapratyayasya prācuryārthatvaṃ ca 'tādātmyārthe vikārārthe prācuryārthe mayaṭ tridhā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3622: tadanukūlatayā ānandaḥ pracuro yasmin sa ānandapracuraḥ iti samāsaḥ kāryo na tadviparītaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3624: tathāpyāndamaya iti taddhitavṛttyananuguṇānandapracuraiti samāsavākyābhidhāne brāhmaṇapracuro grāma itivat ānānandasyāpi prāptestadvāraṇāya pracurānanda iti viparītasamāsaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3627: tathāpi uktaprayojanābhiprāyeṇa pracurānandatvāditi sautravyāsavākyaviparītasamāsaḥ kṛta ityāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3629: yadyapyānandamaya iti śrutisūtrānusāreṇa prācuryasya viśeṣyatvenoktāvapi nānānandaprāptiḥṣa prākāśapracuro ravirityukte 'pi savitaryandhakāraleśāpratīteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3632: tathāpi prācuryasya viśeṣaṇatāyāmanānandāprāpteḥ parairapi svīkṛtatvāt viśeṣyatāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3633: tu tasya samānādhikaraṇavijātīyālpatvanirūpyatvāt brāhmaṇapracuro grāma ityādāviva
GSP33bbdip11u:3655: auṣadhijanitānnaprācuryasya annopajīviṣu pārthivaśarīreṣu sambhave 'pi aprākṛtavigrahe harau asambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3665: na cālpārthatvena māhātmyarūpatvābhāvātsa kathaṃ harau yujyata iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3684: tathā ca sudhoktarītyā gauṇyā vṛttyā upajīvyatvamevādyatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3701: iti ya eva puruṣaḥ so 'nnarasamaya iti annavikārapuruṣaparāmarśādanuvādāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3702: anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityata āha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3704: tathāceti vākyena yasmādātmanaḥ ākāśādikamutpannaṃ sa eṣa puruṣa iti 'anyasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:3708: kimarthamasau parāmṛśyate ityāśaṅkāpanodanāya parāmarśāditi vaktavye prārambhādityāha /
GSP33bbdip11u:3712: 'sa vā'; iti śrutau vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe prasiddhau vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3722: rūpasyānnamayaśarīrasya yataḥ sārabhūto viṣṇuḥ ato 'nnarasamayaḥ“iti annaśabdasyāvṛttyā rasaśabdasya kramavyatyāsena ca vyākhyātam / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3725: nanvevaṃ mayaṭchabdasyobhayārthe prayogādatrāpyubhayapakṣe doṣadarśanātpañcānāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārtho na vikāritvamityatra kiṃ niyāmakam?
GSP33bbdip11u:3727: ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ityata āha - ye 'nnaṃ brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3737: evaṃ pradarśite hetudvaye 'dhyāhṛtahetudvārānvayayogye krameṇa sādhye āha - na vikāritvamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3743: brahmaśabdaśravaṇādanyathāsiddhatatsamabhivyāhārāt ubhayathāpi sambhavatāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārthaḥ na vikāritvamiti niścīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3760: tataścānnamayādīnāṃ madhye ekasyaiva brahmatvakalpanā ca na yuktaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3763: sa tu sūtrakāreṇaiva pūrvapakṣīkṛta iti na tatpakṣaṃ pratyākṣipadbhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3764: tattvapradīpe tu - na ceti vākyaṃ na ca māyinā pṛthakkalpanā 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3767: annamayādayaḥ pañcakośā mitho bhinnāḥ teṣāṃ brahmaśabdoktatve 'pi abrahmatvam/
GSP33bbdip11u:3775: ityādiko vākyaśeṣaḥ saguṇavākyaikavākyatāpannaḥ tatphalapratipādaka ityādikā yuktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3778: bhāṣyakāraḥ savistaraṃ viśiṣya na nirācakhyāviti ṭīkābhiprāyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3782: ityādau bhedasthala eva tathā prayogādityata āha - svarūpe ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3788: tathā ca prakāśasvarūpe 'pi sūryabimbe viśeṣabalāt 'pracuraprakāśo raviritivat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3789: evaṃrūpavyavahāravat ānandādisvarūpe 'pi harau viśeṣeṇa tathā vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadanupapattirityarthaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3792: yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai. 2-7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3794: hetvantararūpaṃ prācuryameva mayaḍartha ityatra ca hetuṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasyati - taddhetviti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3800: tasminnānandamayaprakaraṇe tasya viṣṇoḥ tasmin anandapūrṇatvenānandamayatve prācuryasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:3802: viṣṇureveti sūtravṛttimabhipretya tameva hetuvyapadeśaṃ darśayati - kohīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3804: āsamantātprakāśamāno viṣṇurānandaḥ pūrṇānando na syāt tadāsau lokaṃ na pravartayediti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3813: sudhāyāṃ tu ṇyarthānandarbhāvena na ko 'pi lokikīṃ vaidikīṃ pravṛttiṃ kuryāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3821: tasya parabrahmaṇi mukhyatve 'pi viṣṇoḥ ānandamayāvayavatvoktyādinā bādhakenāmukhyārthasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:3834: kuto 'nnamayādiśabdairmantravarṇalakṣitasyaiva pratipādanaṃ jñāyata ityata uktam - śabdānusandhānāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3835: 'śabdānāṃ'; satyaṃ jñānamanantam ityevaṃrūpāṇām annamayādiśabdānāṃ ca arthānusandhānāt jātāt 'anusandhānāt'
GSP33bbdip11u:3837: mantravarṇe 'pi brahmetyevoktatvātkathaṃ tadarthānāmapyannamayādiśabdānāṃ parabrahmārthatājñaptirityata āha - brahmaviditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3841: parabrahmatajjñānatatprāptīḥ sūcayitvā saṅkṣepeṇaktvā tatra prāptaśaṅkāpanodāya pravṛtto mantravarṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3846: tathā ca na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdādevānandamayādiviṣṇvākhyaṃ parabrahmaiva nāparabrahmetyavasīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3848: iti vedavākyena lakṣaṇavattayā proktaṃ paraṃ brahamaivānnamayādiśabdaiḥ 'gīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:3853: parabrahmaprāptikāmaḥ parabrahma jānīyāt iti śruteḥ phalito 'rthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3857: paramātmānantaḥ pūrṇānandatvādityānandamayaśabdenopapādyata iti satyādiśabdānāṃ annamayādiśabdānāṃ cakārthatvam anusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3873: avayavatve ca avayavitvasya virodho 'pi neti caśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3874: kuta ityato 'vayavina evāvayavatvasyāvayavitvasya ca śrutyuktatvenāvayavyāderavayavādyabhedādityāśayena tāṃ śrutimudāharati - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3885: kintu - bhāṣye upalakṣaṇayā gṛhītā 'padaṃ pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā vai puruṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3888: śiro nārāyaṇaḥ pakṣo dakṣiṇassavya eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3891: pucchaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ eka eva tu pañcadhā //
GSP33bbdip11u:3896: avayavina avayavatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkāṃ śrutyā parihṛtyātra smṛtiṃ cāha - śira iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3897: atra citrādau likhyamānanavanārīrūpe avayavibhūtānāmanekastrīṇāmekadehāvayavatvaṃ tathā nārāyaṇādipañcarūpāṇāṃ ekāvayavatvamucyate/
GSP33bbdip11u:3908: asmin pakṣe tu - tadaṃśe vaiparītyamityupāsanābhedena pakṣabhedoktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:3915: pañcadhā vibhaktaḥ eka evāyavaiḥ abhinna eva na tu bhinnaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3917: avayavitvena prakāreṇa tadbhāvaṃ prāptaḥ krīḍata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3919: nanvastavevaṃ tāvatā na virodhaparihāro jāta ityata āha - aiśvaryāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3930: evaṃ na virodha ityetat avayavāvayavinorabhede 'yamavayavī ayam avayava iti bhedavyavahāravirodho 'pi netyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3942: kiñca - loke parimitaśaktitva eva virodhadarśanāt viṣṇorvirodhopayogiparimitaśaktiśūnyatvāt tarkyatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na virodha
GSP33bbdip11u:3947: tathā ca paroktatarkasya sopādhikatvenāpramāṇatvānna virodhitvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3954: nanu yaduktaṃ sa vā iti vākye 'sya paramātmana eva parāmarśaḥ na annātpuruṣaḥ ityuktadehasyeti tadayuktam;
GSP33bbdip11u:3955: ātmano dūrasthatvāddehasya sa samāpasthatvātsamīpoktaparityāgena dūrasthaparāmarśāṅgīkāre kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3956: kiñca - puruṣapadena prakṛtasyaiva puruṣapadenoktatvāt ātmanaśca tena aprakṛtatvātpuruṣapadena parāmarśāyogaḥ / na ca -
GSP33bbdip11u:3958: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān //
GSP33bbdip11u:3959: iti vākyadvayasthapuruṣapadena ekavidhenaiva vyavasthāyā paramātmajīvayoruktigrahaṇavadihāpi ekavidhenaiva dviruktena puruṣapadena vyavasthayārthadvayoktyaṅgīkāro 'stviti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3961: sa vā ityatra ca paramātmaivocyata iti vyavasthāṅgīkārāyogādityata āha - raseti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3966: tathā ca sa vā iti vākyena cideva cinmātraṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate parāmṛśyate na dehaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3970: ityākāśādipuruṣāntaśabdairuktaṃ tattatsārabhūtam ākāśādipadārthaśreṣṭhabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaiva sa vā iti parāmarśavākyenocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3971: evaṃ tarhi puruṣapadena dvayorapi prakṛtatvādubhayaparāmarśo 'yamastviti na ca vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3972: yataḥ tatsārabhūtaṃ puruṣasārabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaivānyadehādikaṃ vihāya saḥ iti parāmarśavākyenocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3976: rasaśabdena rasaśabdārthena mukhyatvena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvāt annatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasyeti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3981: kintu, tattatsārabhūtaṃ tattatkośaniyāmakaṃ tadgataṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3983: ityādau raso vai saḥ ityante cānnamayādīnāṃ kośavyāvṛttyarthaṃ tadbhedārthameva rasaśabdena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3989: kintu brahmaiva tasyaiva ca saḥ ityādau parāmarśaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3992: na ca vācyam upaniṣaddraṣṭā munirbrahmāparokṣīkṛtya pratyakṣato nirdiśatīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3994: kiñca - svasyāparokṣato jñātatvena śabdānapekṣaṇāt upadeśyapuruṣāṇāṃ cāparokṣāyogyatvānnirdeśavaiyarthyamityata tadasyetyapi vyākhyeyam /
