GSP33bbdip11u:3997: lakṣaṇayā brahmaśirasi idamiti nirdeśo yujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3999: tathā ca vastraprāvṛte varmāntargate vā jānunīdaṃ jānviti vyavahāravadayamapi vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4007: iti śrutivirodhaḥ ityapyayuktamapramitatvādityata āha - ananya iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4012: abhinno 'pi anyo bhinna iti śabdena procyata /
GSP33bbdip11u:4022: brahmāṇḍe purāṇe ityanantaram uktatvānna virodha ityanvayaḥ/ @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4029: nanu brahmaśabdasya sādhāraṇatvāt taddhetuvyapadeśasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatayā spaṣṭapratibhānāt
GSP33bbdip11u:4031: cābhāvādānandamayādayo viriñcādaya eva santviti śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramavatārayati - na ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4040: kuto neti hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya pratijñāṃśasya na cetyādibhāṣyeṇaiva vyākhyātatvātsautramananyathāsiddhahetumeva vyācaṣṭe - netara iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4046: asya hetuvākyasya adhyāhṛtahetuvākyadvārā na ceti pratijñayānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4054: viṣṇujñānādeva mokṣo netarajñānādityetatkuta ityata āha - tamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4056: iti śrutyā mokṣasya viṣṇujñānādanya upāyo nāstītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4065: hetvantareṇa brahmādīnāmānandamayatvaṃ parākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4066: atra pūrvahetusamuccāyakena caśabdenānandamayādirnetara iti pratijñāvākyānuvṛtterapi sūcanāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4067: tadvihāya sūtroktaṃ bhedavyapadeśaṃ darśayati - te ye śatamiti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4090: iti apakṛṣṭotkṛṣṭasarvajīsthitirūpabhedakadharmokteḥ jīvasamudāyasya cānevaṃvidhatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4098: ātmanaḥ ime ātmyāḥ jīvagīṇāḥ na vidyante ātmyāḥ yasmin so 'nātmyaḥ tasmin jīvaguṇavidhure /
GSP33bbdip11u:4099: athavā - ātmanaḥ svāmino 'yamātmyaḥ svāmisambandhī sa netyanātmyaḥ tasmin,
GSP33bbdip11u:4124: tathāpi tena kathaṃ brahmādīnāṃ bhedaḥ sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4140: kuto netyatastatraitacchrutīnāṃ parabrahmārthakatvena advaitārthatvābhāvāditi hetūpaskāramabhipretya teṣāṃ parabrahmārthatve pramāṇamāha - nāmānīti
GSP33bbdip11u:4143: tathā ca padasamanvayenaiteṣāṃ brahmaparatvānnaitadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4157: idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavānivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4161: bhagavataḥ sarvaikyaśruteḥ sarvasvāmitvanimittaikyaparatvādityāśayena tatra pramāṇatvena bhāgavatasmṛtiṃ paṭhati - idaṃ hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4170: jagataḥ sthānaṃ sthitiḥ nirodho nāśaḥ sambhavaḥ utpattiḥ te yasmādbhavanti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4172: athavā - tiṣṭhatyasmāt niruddhyate pralīyate 'smin sambhāvayatīti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4174: evambhūtsya jagadbhedaḥ pramāṇasiddha iti jñāpanāya hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4175: tattvapradīpe tu - bahuvrīhiṃ vinā idaṃ viśvaṃ bhagavāniva;
GSP33bbdip11u:4183: bhagavān sarvabhinno 'pi sarvasvāmitvāt sarva ityabhedena vedādiṣūcyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4189: nanu bhedajñānasya mithyājñānatvātkathaṃ tadanusāreṇaikyaśrutayo yojyanta ityāśaṅkāṃ bhāgavatavākyena pariharati - vidyeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4190: idaṃ ca kā vidyetyuddhavapraśnasyottaratvena kṛṣṇenoktaṃ vacanamekādaśaskandhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:4194: na ca bhidāyā abodha iti vyākhyeyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:4196: nanu bhedajñānasya puruṣārthahetutvāt kathaṃ tasya vidyātvamityata āha - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4210: abhito harermānena parameśvare bahumānena āgraheṇa ca 'niḥsaṅgena karmaṇāpi';
GSP33bbdip11u:4231: tattvapradīpe tu - abhimāneneti padaṃ abhito mānena viśeṣajñāneneti vyākhyāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:4239: guṇānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ vyatikare vaiṣamye jāte sati yathāpūrvaṃ jñānādiguṇatāratamyaṃ parasparabhedaṃ ca avihāya tadviśiṣṭa eva 'prajāyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:4250: ata eva anyaṃ jīvādbhinnaṃ viṣṇum iti tadetatsatyam (mu. 2-1-1-.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4251: ityādinā prāguktaprakāreṇa asya mahimānaṃ ca yadā paśyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4252: paśyo jīvaḥ tadā vītaśoko mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4253: tattvapradīpe tu - juṣṭaṃ devaiḥ asya jīvasya īśam anyaṃ yadā paśyati mahimānaṃ mahimaguṇātmakaṃ tadā tadaiva vītaśoko bhavati na duḥkhaleśamapi spṛśati jīvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4254: na tu mahimaguṇavihīnam anyamanīśamasevitaṃ paśyan vītaśoko bhavatīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4256: ityatra ayamanyomārga ityukte prasiddhamārgādanyatvabodhavat anyamīśamityukte īśaśabditasya brahmaṇaḥ prasiddheśādrudrāt anyatvapratīterbrahmaṇo rudrādanyatve pramāṇatvenoktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4262: 'asarvaḥ sarva ivātmaiva sannanātmeva pratyaṅparāṅivaika īyate bahudheyate'
GSP33bbdip11u:4264: evaṃ svāmitvārthatayā parābhimatādvaitaśrutīrvyākhyāya vākyasamanvayāśrayaṇena antaryāmitayāpi tāḥ śrutismṛtibhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe - asarva iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4265: yadyapi asarvaḥ iti vākyam ātmaśabdasya svāmitvārthatvamupetya svāmitvena nimittenaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityatra pramāṇatayodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4266: tathāpi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpyasya pramāṇatvasambhavādubhayatrāpi pramāṇatayodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4267: tattvapradīpakṛtāmapi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpi asarvaḥ iti śrutiḥ pramāṇamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4268: na caivaṃ tattadantaryāmitvenāpi tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇorastītyāha - sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti tattvapradīpavirodhaḥ;
GSP33bbdip11u:4270: antaryāmitvenāpītyuktyā na kevalaṃ nāmāni iti śrutibalāttattacchabdapravṛttinimittatvena tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4271: api tu antaryāmitvenāpītyetāvanmātrapratīteḥ atra padasamanvaye tātparyānavagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4272: mahāvākyagatasyaitadādiśabdasyaikaikasya sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti smṛtibalāt antaryāmitvanimittena viṣṇuvācitve 'pi padāntarāṇānyaparatvena vākyasamanvayasyaiva vaktavyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4273: yadā nāmāni iti śrutibalāt kriyākārakādisarvārthavācisarvapadasya viṣṇuvācitvābhyupagamaḥ tadaiva padasamanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4274: na tvekaikasya viṣṇuvācitva iti na virodhaḥ tathā cāntaryāmitvanimittena tattvamasyādivākyagatatvamahamādipadānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve tvaṃ tvadantaryāmī tat brahma /
GSP33bbdip11u:4276: na caivami asi asmi iti kriyāpadānvayāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4279: yadyapi nimittakathanaprakaraṇe vidyātmani bhedadṛṣṭyā juṣṭaṃ yadā iti vākyatrayasyānvayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4280: tathāpi svāmitvanimittenaikyavyapadeśa ityatra śrutismṛtyorupanyāne sati tatra prāptaśaṅkāparihārasyāvaśyakatvenāvasarasaṅgatyā tadvākyatrayapravṛtteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4281: ityādeḥ ityasāyatrākarṣaṇena na virodhaḥ ityasyānukarṣaṇena cānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4282: śrutyarthastu - viṣṇuḥ asarvo 'pi sarvanātmako 'pi sarva iva sarvātmaka iva sarvātmakatvena īyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4283: kuta ityatastatrāntaryāmitvaṃ hetutvenābhipretya anantaryāmitvapratītyā tasyāsiddhimāśaṅkyāha - ātmaiveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4284: ātmaiva antaryāmyeva san anātmeva anantaryāmitvena īyate jñāyate rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu /
GSP33bbdip11u:4290: nanu viṣṇau viruddhānekadharmābhyupagame bhedāpattyā ekameva iti śrutivirodha ityata āha - eka iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4294: tattvapradīpe tu - pratyaṅ parāṅiva abhimukho 'pyanabhimukha iva eka eva bahudheyate jñāyate prāpyate ca ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4304: saḥ sarvātmakatvena vyapadiśyamāno bhagavān brahma sarvatra pūrṇatvādbrahmasaṃjña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4305: nanvanyatrādṛṣṭamantargatasya bahirgatatvādikaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityata āha - sa īśvara iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4306: saḥ hariḥ yataḥ īśvaraḥ acintyaśaktyupetaḥ atastasmin anyatrāghaṭitamapi sarvaṃ ghaṭata iti // @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4308: eṣo 'haṃ tvamasau ceti na tu sarvasvarūpataḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:4312: yadvā - yāmo niyamanaṃ tatra bhava ityarthe ṭhak,
GSP33bbdip11u:4313: yato viṣṇuḥ sarvāntaryāmikaḥ sarvāntarniyāmakaḥ ata eva eṣa ātmeti hovāca (chā. 8-3-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4317: iti vākyasthena eṣo 'haṃtvamasāviti sarvanāmnā sarvavācakasarvanāmasaṃṅakaśabdena sarvamiti nāmnā cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4320: mokṣadharme hi vaiśampāyanaṃ prati he brahman bhedavākyāt bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4324: tathā - puruṣabāhulyamupetyaikyavākyasya śreṣṭhaparatvapakṣe 'pi ātmasu kiṃ sarve samāḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4328: taṃ tathā ca bhavān vaktumarhatītyāśayena kṛtasya janamejayapraśnasya vaiśampāyanenoktamuttaram -
GSP33bbdip11u:4334: tathā ca vedāḥ ekameva puruṣaṃ vadantītyetanmataṃ jñānino necchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4335: yadvā - etasmin jagati ekaṃ puruṣaṃ necchanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:4343: he kurukulodvaha eteṣāṃ bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇām ātmānāṃ madhye yā yoniḥ yaḥ kāraṇabhūtaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4344: ekā śreṣṭhaḥ yathā ca śreṣṭha ucyate śrutyādau tathā tena prakāreṇa taṃ viśvaṃ pūrṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4345: guṇādhikaṃ puruṣam ākhyāsyāmi vyākhyāsyāmīti prameyadīpikāvyāsatīrthīyadiśā smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4347: tathā ca sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ yadekaṃ brahmatattvamasi tasmādatyavaro 'si atyavaro 'smīti śrutyartha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4348: ityādeśca ityasya na ca tattvamasītyādivirodhaḥ ityanenānvayaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4355: aprāptasya ca pratiṣedhāyogāt ityata āha - uktā ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4357: co yato na ca tattvamasi ityādinā jīveśvaikyasya prāptiḥ śrutyarthāparijñānanimittā prasaktiruktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4359: nanvetacchrutīnāmavirodhakatve 'pi bhedaśruteḥ brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti iti śrutivirodhastu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4360: atra brahmaiveteyavakāreṇa jīvasyābrahmatāniṣedhena tadadhīnatvādinā nimittena abrahmabhūte brahmatvavyavahāra ityuktagaterasambhavādityata āha - brahmaiveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4366: tathā ca yato brahmaiva san iti vākye śruto 'yamādyo brahmaśabdaḥ brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi iti śruterjīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4369: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4371: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4373: tathā ca saḥ muktajīvo brahmaiva san jīva eva san jīvabhāvamavihāyaiva pralaye parabrahmāpnoti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4374: apihitassan praviśatīti śrutyarthopapatteḥ noktabhedavyapadeśasyaitacchrutivarodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4377: prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma pralaye pralaye sadā / iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4383: nanu brahmaśabdasya parabrahmaṇyeva mukhyatvānna jīve 'sau yujyata ityata āha - upapadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4385: tathā ca brahmaśabdo yadyapi parabrahmaṇi mukhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4386: tathāpi virodhe svīyapūrvottaravākyavirodhe prāmāṇāntaravirodhe vā sati jīve 'pyupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4387: prakṛte ca brahmāpyeti ityuttarabhāvisvavākyena paramaṃ sāmyam iti pūrvavākyena bhedagrāhipratyakṣādinā ca virodho 'stīti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4391: atra saṃsāre 'pi jīvasya muktatvoktyā tadanyathānupapattyā parabrahmatvāvagamāt ityata āha - pramādeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4393: tathā ca api - jīvasya parabrahmatvābhāve 'pi vimuktatvaṃ vimuktatvavacanaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4394: na kevalaṃ brahmaśabda upapadyate iti cārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4406: he kṣatriyādya mṛtyuḥ saṃsāra tadabhāvarūpāmṛtatvaṃ cetyubhe api satye eva pravṛtte /
GSP33bbdip11u:4408: tarhi mithyā syādityato netyāha - pramādaṃ vā iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4409: ahaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ pramādaṃ asvābhāvikaṃ bravīmi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4410: amṛtatvaṃ muktatvaṃ tu apramādāt pramādāpāyāt bravīmītyarthaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4420: nanu bhedokteḥ śrutivirodhābhāve 'pi jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ cetanatvāt brahmavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:4426: kintu tasyāḥ bhedokteḥ tenādvaitaparikalpitānumānena virodho 'pi netyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4440: yatheccham īśvaro na svatantraḥ cetanatvāt devadattavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:4441: jaḍa ātmā vastutvādityādirūpeṇa na tattve atattve 'pi anumātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4442: ataḥ anena pratyakṣādiviruddhasyāpi pramāṇatve cetanatvavastutvāderapi pramāṇatvaṃ syāt aviśeṣāditi vipakṣe bādhakatarka ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4444: ityekadeśotkīrtanena yathākāmāditi samagraśabdo lakṣyate jyotiśśabdena jyotiṣṭomaśabdavat ityāśayena yathākāmamityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4454: smṛtyanusāreṇa sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvajñānāsādhanatvaprakaṭanāya parābhimatānumāne sādhanagocarecchāviṣayatvaniṣedhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4458: na apekṣā yasyāṃ sā tathāktā tattvajñānakāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4461: tadviruddhāpi sadanumā kiṃ na syāt? na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4464: tathā ca pratyakṣādiviruddhāyā api prāmāṇye uktarītyā atattvaviṣaye pravṛttāyā anumāyā api prāmāṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:4480: apavṛttaṃ viruddhaṃ gaṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ sā apagā,
GSP33bbdip11u:4493: kutaḥ? yat sā anumā kevalānumā yathākāmā tasmāditi yojyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4503: spaṣṭoktitvātprathamaṃ smṛtimupanyasyātraiva arthe śrutisammatiṃ cāha - naiṣeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4519: tathā ca iti kaṭhaśrutau coktamiti sambandhaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4520: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti / BBs_1,1.19 /
GSP33bbdip11u:4532: asyānyasya ceti pratītinirāsāya caśabdaṃ vyākhyāti yuktīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4539: anena na kevalaṃ bhedavyapadeśādānandamayena jīvānāṃ bhedaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4540: kiṃ nāma? yato 'smin prakaraṇe asya jīvasyānenānandamayena saha 'asmiṃśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:4543: ato na tadaikyaṃ jīvānāṃ nāpi sāṃsārika eva bhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4551: tasmādānandamayo na jīvakośādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4575: kriyata iti śāstrādhyāyapādasaṅgatayaḥ siddhā ityāśayena pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyasaṅgatī
GSP33bbdip11u:4585: hṛdayaguhāntaḥpraviṣṭaṃ jagatkartāraṃ candramasyantarmanasā svecchayā carantaṃ sahaiva sthitam etaṃ devāstattvābhimāninaḥ kārtsnyena na vijānantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4592: 'indro rājā'; ityādivākyairyato 'nyo 'ntaḥsthatayā pratīyate ata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4596: brahmendramagniṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ diva ātmānaṃ savitāraṃ bṛhaspatim /
GSP33bbdip11u:4611: iti padasya sapta buddhīndriyāṇi viṣayeṣu jīvena juhotīti saptahotā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4617: sūryarathaṃ prati svātmānaṃ yuñjanti rathe yuktāni bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4618: saptacchando 'bhimāninā pṛthagvedābhimānī saptacchando nāmā ekaḥ pradhāno 'śvo 'sti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4621: ata eva 'sapta yuñjanti .... eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:4625: sadā dṛḍham arvaśabditebhyo vājibhyo dūrasthatvādanarvaṃ cakraṃ sūryarathasyāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4648: 'samudre antaḥ kavayo vicakṣate marīcīnāṃ padamicchanti vedhasaḥ'; (tai.ā. 3-11-11.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4652: kuto na mantavyamityatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - antariti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4653: sūtre 'ntarityuddeśyabhāge apekṣitaṃ padamadhyāhṛtya darśayati - śrūyamāṇa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4659: tasya dharmāstaddharmāḥ teṣāmupadeśo vacanaṃ ityādirūpaścāsau taddharmopadeśaśca ityāditaddharmopadeśaḥ tasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4670: upadeśādityantasya sūtrasya tasmādanya eveti na mantavyamityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4675: jñānakarmākhyadaśendriyeṣu viṣayahotāraṃ tattadviṣayasthāpakaṃ daśendriyāṇi jīvena viṣayeṣu juhvataṃ vā viṣṇum 'anvavindat'; vyajānāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4680: pramitaruktvanimittāt marīcipadoktānāṃ jīvānāṃ padam āśrayaṃ viṣṇum icchanti prārthayanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4684: jñānāya marīcīnāṃ padaṃ viṣṇum icchantītyekānvayo vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4696: kṣīrasamudrasthatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - sa hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4703: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4704: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4707: tathāpi pralayārṇavasthatvasya brahmāṇḍavīryatvasya ca kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityatastayorviṣṇudharmatve pramāṇaṃ vaktuṃ pratijānīte - tasyeti
GSP33bbdip11u:4714: iti paścātpramāṇopanyāsaḥ śrutāvaṇḍakośaśabdaśravaṇe 'pi pratyayasya svārthikatvāttattyāgenāṇḍakośa ityevānūditam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4736: āpaḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ ayanaṃ 'tena saḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4741: aṇḍaṃ praviṣṭo yo viṣṇuḥ so 'ṇḍaṃ bhittvā prakāśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4751: itaśca brahmāṇḍajanakavīryatvaṃ pralayasthatvaṃ ca tasyaiva jñāyata ityāha - ahamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4756: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ tadaheyamiti vyutkramaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4758: aheyaṃ ratiḥ śaṃ ca mitamasyeti raśmirjīvaḥ tamindayati prerayatīti raśmīt jīvaprerakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4759: inda preraṇe iti dhātoḥ ayaṃ dakārāntaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4760: anukṛtyadhikaraṇe tu - indhī dīptāviti dhātuvyākhyānāt raśmīt bhagavadapekṣayā raśmirūpāṇām alpānāṃ sūryāditejasāṃ prakāśakamiti vyākhyātam,
GSP33bbdip11u:4763: pūrṇaṣaḍguṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadākhyaṃ brahma teja iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4785: evaṃ ca pūrvottarapakṣadvaye anyonyaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaśūnye sati tadanyathānupapattyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4786: antaḥsthena viṣṇunendrādīnāmabhedaḥ prāpta ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4795: anena sūtre vidheyasamuccayārthakacaśabdasya bhinnakrameṇa anvayena na kevalamantaśśrūyamāṇo viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4797: kutaḥ? tasyendrādyantaryāmitvadantassthatvakathanena tebhyo bhedokteriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4800: 'indro rājā'; ityādau tu indrādiśabdāḥ paramamukhyavṛttyā viṣṇuparā eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4802: tathā ca mano vihāya pañcasu jñānendriyeṣu śabdādiviṣayahotā tairviṣayānubhāvakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4809: 'brahmā'; caturmukhaḥ devānāṃ hṛdyayanāt sthiteḥ pravartanādvā hṛdayaṃ viṣṇum 'anvavindat';
GSP33bbdip11u:4815: (tai. 2-7.) iti ākāśasyānandamayatve heturuktaḥ na tu viṣṇoḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4817: phalakathanena pūrvapakṣaḥ sūcito bhavatītyāśayena pūrvapakṣaphalamāha - ko hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4827: iti taittirīyaśrutyukto 'pi sa eveti taduktahetunā tasyaivānandamayatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33bbdip11u:4829: pūrvasaṅgatistvadhikāśaṅkāṃ kṛtvātra pūrvanyāya evātidiśyata ityātideśikī draṣṭavyā / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4839: kuto na mantavyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtramupādatte /
GSP33bbdip11u:4846: dvitīyastu na mantavyamiti pratijñāyāṃ sūtrārthasya hetutvadyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4847: viṣayādeḥ pūrvapakṣaphalakathanena sūcane 'pi mukhato 'nukteḥ tadanuvādapūrvakaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - asyeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4861: iti chandogavākye bhūtākāśasya śrutyādibalādasti pratipādyatvasya prāptiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4862: tathāpi nāsāvatra vākye ākāśapadena vācyo yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:4871: iti taittirīyavākye 'pyasāveva pratipādyata iti tasyaivānandamayatve heturukto na tu bhūtasya/
GSP33bbdip11u:4878: āśraya iti śilakena pṛṣṭaḥ pravāhaṇo rājā ādīptatvādākāśanāmako viṣṇuriti pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip11u:4879: kathamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tadupapādanāya tasyākāśasya mahimānamāha - 'sarvāṇi havā imāni
GSP33bbdip11u:4880: bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4881: parāyaṇaṃ sa eṣa paro varīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4885: bhūtaśabdo bhūtākāśa evātrocyate iti pūrvapakṣe ākāśavyatiriktabhūtaparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4893: tatraiva pralaye muktau ca līnāḥ bhavanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4898: uttamāśrayaḥ naitasmāduttamaṃ vastvāśaṅkyamiti bhāvenāha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4900: parasmāduttamaṃ proktaṃ paro iti tataḥ param /
GSP33bbdip11u:4902: iti sāmasaṃhitāvacanānusāreṇādau para iti śabdāntarasya madhye varaśabdāntarasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4903: ca āvāpena vṛttivākye subādeśasya sorulopena rutvotvaguṇeṣu samāne pare optaśabdadvayasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4911: 'viṣṇornu kaṃ vīryāṇi pravocaṃ yaḥ pārthivān vimame rajāṃsi'; (ṛ. 1-154-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4915: ityuktānantatvasyāparimitatvasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha-viṣṇoriti/
GSP33bbdip11u:4923: ityuktasarvottamatvasya viṣṇudharmatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - para iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4927: tatrādyo 'viṣṇornu vīryagaṇanāṃ katamo 'rhatīha yaḥ parthivānyapi kavirvimame rajāṃsi';
GSP33bbdip11u:4931: yadyapi śrutyanusārātsarvottamatve prathamaṃ pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ na tu anantatve /
GSP33bbdip11u:4950: ataḥ sāvakāśatvātkathaṃ viṣṇoreva talliṅgamityataḥ smṛtimāha - ananta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4955: iti brāhma ityasya tasyaiva talliṅgamityuktamiti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4959: nanu śrutyā pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgena nirṇayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4960: liṅgasya śrutito durbalatvādityataḥ ākāśaśrutirviṣṇau sāvakāśeti śrutyā darśayati - nāmānīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4963: ato liṅgena śruterbādhayā nirṇayo yukta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4969: paścātsaṅgatyādikaṃ vaktavyamiti sūcayitumatra sūtramādāveva paṭhati - ata eveti / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4970: tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo abhavaḥ mahān bhogaḥ prajāpateḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4971: bhujaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ yaddevān prāṇayo nava (tai. ā. 3-14.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4973: viṣayavākyodāharṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇena saṅgatiṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca sūcayati - taditi //
GSP33bbdip11u:4987: yasmācca pāyuguhyaikyena navendriyābhimānino devān tvaṃ 'prāṇayaḥ'; aceṣṭayaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:4989: tasmāttvaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇaśabdavācyo 'bhava iti siddhāntarītyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4999: saḥ vāyuruta viṣṇuriti saṃśayaśca sūcito bhavati / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5006: tathā ca paramānandatvaṃ yasya prāṇasyoktaṃ saḥ 'prāṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:5009: kutaḥ? prasiddheḥ prāṇaśruteḥ tasyāśca tasminvāyau prasiddhe rūḍhatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:5010: prāṇapadapravṛttinimittasya jīvanāḍihetutvasya ca śarīre sati mukhye jīvanādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:5019: evaṃ prāṇasya vāyutvaṃ ānandamayatvaṃ ca na yuktamityarthaḥ / kuto
GSP33bbdip11u:5020: naivamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - yata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5023: tathā ca yato 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇoreva ato naivamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5024: kuto 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇurevetyataḥ sautraṃ hetumanūdya vyācaṣṭe - ata eveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5027: kathaṃ śrutyā pūrvapakṣite liṅgena nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvajñāpanāyaivakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5028: tathā ca sāvakāśaśruterniravakāśaliṅgena bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5029: he viṣṇo 'te'; tava śrīśca lakṣmīśceti dve patnyau staḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5031: tattvapradīpe tu - aṅkasthitā śrīḥ vakṣasi lakṣmabhūtā lakṣmīrityuktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:5048: sarvabuddhiniyantāraṃ jagatpatiṃ sarvasaṃhartāraṃ hariṃ devāḥ anugacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5060: 'vi me karṇā patayato vicakṣurvī3daṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat /
GSP33bbdip11u:5061: vi me manaścarati dūra ādhīḥ kiṃ svidvakṣyāmi kimu nūmaniṣye'
GSP33bbdip11u:5063: atrādhikaraṇe tattatsūktagatāśeṣaśabdopalakṣakasya lokato 'nyatraprasiddhasya jyotirnāmno brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5064: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayasaṅgatī viṣayavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca darśayati - yo vedeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5072: anena vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣaparyālocanayā jyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvasādhanamukhenānandamayatvasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepādānandamayādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ sūcitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5073: jyotirviṣayaḥ kimagniruta viṣṇuriti sandehaśca sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5074: 'vi me'; iti ṛṅmantre vītyupasargāṇāṃ kriyāpadenānvayaḥ / tatra
GSP33bbdip11u:5080: ata eva tattvapradīpe 'spaṣṭatvāya vicaraṇābhidhānāt ityuktam'; ityuktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:5085: tathā ca yato me karṇau jyotiṣo viruddhaṃ patayataḥ patataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5088: yathā karṇāderjyotirvidūratvaṃ evaṃ jyotiṣo 'pi karṇādividūratvamityāha - vīdamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5091: ā samantāt sthitaṃ jyotistadatyantaṃ karṇādiviruddhaṃ vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5092: evaṃ me manaḥ jyotiṣo dūre vicarati atīva taddarśanaviruddhaṃ vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5107: tathā ca tajjyotirguhānihitaṃ cāgnireva bhavediti prāptaṃ, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:5113: ata eva pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraṭīkāyāṃ śrutiprakaraṇayorbalavatvāditi prasiddhapadalakṣitāyāḥ śruteḥ prathamamuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5114: ata eva candrikāyāṃ bhāṣye agnisūktasthatvācceti caśabdaprayogādityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5115: tathā ca śrutiprakaraṇābhyāṃ guhānihitatvaliṅgamātrasya bādhāt agnirevedaṃ jyotirguhānihitaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5121: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāpto 'taḥ uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavānbādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5123: sūtre tattvityasya anuvṛttiṃ vipariṇāmaṃ cābhipretya pratijñāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - viṣṇureveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5126: iti hetvaṃśaṃ caraṇaśabdasya vicaraṇārthatvaṃ karṇādīnāmityasya adhyāhāraṃ cābhipretya vyācaṣṭe - karṇādīnāmiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5135: tāvatā tasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityataḥ karṇādividūratvasya viṣṇvekaliṅgatve śrutimudāharan tatpratijānīte - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5145: kutaḥ? atra karṇādīnāmetajjyotiḥ prati sākalyena tadaviṣayīkaraṇarūpaviruddha 'caraṇābhidhānāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:5147: māpayati jñāpayati viṣayāniti vā mīyante viṣayā aneneti vā mātrā indriyagaṇaḥ tayā tatastvaṃ 'paro';
GSP33bbdip11u:5148: dūro 'sīti he viṣṇo anyamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ sīmānaṃ te mahimānaṃ ko 'pi śrotrādinā nāpeti ca prakṛtānuguṇyena śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5155: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.25 /
GSP33bbdip11u:5168: ato jyotirapi na viṣṇuḥ kintu chandaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5170: chandasā gāyatryā tadaikyābhiprāyeṇa jyotiṣo 'bhidhānāt upakramāditi cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:5174: gāyatryādipadairviṣṇorevābhidhānaṃ ca tadabhedavidhānārthaṃ kintu tathopāsanārthamevetyāha - tatheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5180: anena prasiddhagāyatryādipadena viṣṇorabhidhānaṃ vyarthamiti śaṅkā parihṛtā/
GSP33bbdip11u:5183: tadeva kuta ityata āha - tathā hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5186: dṛśyate jñāyate 'rtho yayeti vyupattyā 'gāyati ca trāyati ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:5199: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣu /
GSP33bbdip11u:5206: yato 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:5217: sā ca gāyatrī virṇasamāveśalakṣaṇamantrātmakachanda eva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5218: kutaḥ? tasmāt gāyatrīśabdasya chandasyeva rūḍhatvādvāktvābhidhānācceti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5220: iti pūrvavākyasthagāyatrīśabdasya viṣṇvanyaparatve tata evottaravākyasthajyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvāpattyā tata eva agnisūktagatajyotiṣo 'pi tadanyatvameva bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:5221: ata evānandamayatvamapi anyasyaiva bhavenna viṣṇoriti pūrvoktākṣepeṇa etadadhikaraṇotthānātpūrveṇāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5226: tathā tasmāt jyotirapi chanda eveti tasyaiva guhānihitatvamāndamayatvaṃ ceti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ ca sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5236: tṛtīyaṃ satyaloke ca sadanaṃ trividhaṃ matam //
GSP33bbdip11u:5239: na vidyate uttamo loko yebhyasteṣu pratyavareṣviti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5246: yo gāyatrīnāmā gāyatrīsaṃsthaḥ strīrūpo hayaśīrṣākhyo bhagavān tadidaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamityāśayena tasya dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ vaktuṃ gāyatrītyādivākyaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5262: tathā ca jyotiḥśabdena viṣṇureva nigadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5263: kuta ityato nigadāditi hetuṃ yojayati - hi nigadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5272: prasiddhasya gāyatrīpadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanamatra vadatā sūtrakṛtā pūrvatrottaratra
GSP33bbdip11u:5273: cāgnyādipadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanaṃ sūcitamiti darśayitum /
GSP33bbdip11u:5274: na ca gāyatryādipadābhyāmeva gāyatrīpadasamanvayaphalasya pūrvatrottaratra coktasamanvayaphalasya ca sūcanasambhavādagnipadaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam
GSP33bbdip11u:5282: ata eva tattvapradīpe ādiśabdasyobhayatrānvayaṃ prathamādiśabdena tejaḥśabdānāṃ dvitīyena
GSP33bbdip11u:5283: chandaśśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamabhipretya 'agnyāditejaḥśabdānāṃ gāyatryādichandaśśabdānāṃ ca'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5297: viṣṇuḥ syāttadeva kuta ityato gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgādityāśayena tasyāsiddhiparihārāya
GSP33bbdip11u:5305: ādipadena 'yā vai sā gāyatrī iyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva nātiśīyate'; (chāṃ. 3-12.2.)
GSP33bbdip11u:5312: 'yā'; prasiddhā gāyatrī tannāmā viṣṇuḥ 'sā iyaṃ vai'; iyaṃ khalu /
GSP33bbdip11u:5315: kathaṃ pṛthivī viṣṇurityataḥ tallakṣaṇayogādityāha - asyāṃ hīdamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5325: nanu gāyatryādiśabdasya anyatra rūḍhatvātkathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa viṣṇutvaniścaya ityato
GSP33bbdip11u:5326: gāyatryādiśruteḥ sāvakāśatvāditi bhāvena gāyatryagnipṛthivyādiśabdāḥ na kevalaṃ śrutyuktayogena viṣṇau sāvakāśāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5327: api tu paurāṇikarūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavadadhīnatvādapītyāśayena tatra smṛtimāha - sarveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5333: kuta ityataḥ chanda ādīnāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāditi pratyekaṃ hetutrayasūcanāya hiśabdatrayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5335: chandasāṃ lokānāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt devānāṃ ca parokṣatvādeṣo 'sāviti vicitroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5336: kathaṃ tarhyanyatra vyavahāra ityata āha - teṣāmiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5345: hetvantareṇāpi gāyatryāḥ viṣṇutvaṃ sādhayatsūtramupanyasya tadgṛhītāṃ śrutimudāharati - bhūtādīti/
GSP33bbdip11u:5347: sūtre bhūtaṃ viśvamādiḥ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ yeṣu te bhūtādayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5348: te pādāḥ yasya gāyatrīpadārthasya sa bhūtādipādaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5349: tasya vyapadeśaḥ tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasyopapatteḥ yuktatvāditi vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5356: bhūtādiśabdagṛhītāmṛtākhyāṃśacatuṣṭavattvopadeśāt tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatteranyatrānupapattereva gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavedityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:5357: caśabdasya vyapadeśapadenānvaye gāyatryā viṣṇutve sādhye pūrvasūtre darśanapadoktahetoḥ etatsūtroktahetudvayasya ca samuccaye saḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5358: yathāśrutānvaye tu bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ na kevalaṃ viṣṇorevopapatteḥ siddham,
GSP33bbdip11u:5359: kintu puruṣasūktoktatvācceti hetusamuccaye sa iti jñeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5361: iti vākyena yaiṣā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī sā catuṣpadetyevaṃ gāyatrīnāmakasya bhagavataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:5363: catuṣpādatvaṃ vidhāya svoktārtha eva puruṣasūktamantraḥ samākhyārūpatvenodāhṛto brāhmaṇena
GSP33bbdip11u:5371: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'; (chāṃ. 3-12-6.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5390: tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyasyaikaḥ pāda iti pādavidhānadarśanāt;
GSP33bbdip11u:5396: trayāṇāṃ pādānām aṃśānāṃ samudāyo nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhasaṃjñaṃ triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamānatvācca dyuśabdavācyeṣu śvetadvīpānantāsanavaikuṇṭheṣu tiṣṭhatīti ṛcoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5404: pādaṃ ṣaḍḍhoturna kilā vivitse (tai.ā. 3-11.) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5405: pāda iti ekadeśaparimitaṃ caturbhāgabala itivadbhinnaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:5417: tathā ca 'co'; yataḥ śrutisthena pāda iti śabdena na bhūtānāmityamṛtapādatrayavatsvarūpāṃśatvamucyate/
GSP33bbdip11u:5419: kintu, yajñadattasya caturbhāgabalo devadatta iti vadbhinnameva viśvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5421: viṣṇupādaparimitasāmarthyam ataḥ pāda iti viṣṇupādatvenocyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5424: tathā ca yataḥ śrautapāda iti padena caturbhāgabala itivat na viśvaṃ viṣṇusāmarthyasya caturthāṃśaparimitamityucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5427: kuta etat jñāyata ityata āha - suvarṇaṃ kośamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5462: yadvā - liṅgavyatyayasya chāndasatvaṃ kośamityasya dvitīyāntatvaṃ copetya strīliṅgapadānāmapi kośaviśeṣaṇatvenaika evānvayaḥ/ @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5472: ato liṅgamanyaniṣṭhaṃ bhaviṣyatītyataḥ sautracaśabdena bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatve
GSP33bbdip11u:5473: sādhye puruṣasūktoktatvāditi yadanumānaṃ sūcitaṃ tasyāprayojakatvamāśaṅkya pariharati - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5477: anyathā bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇudharmatvābhāve puruṣasūktapratipādyatvaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5478: yadvā - gāyatryā viṣṇutve sādhye sūtre bhinnakrameṇānvitacaśabdasūcitayuktyantaramāha - sa hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5480: catuṣpadetyuktagāyatrīcatuṣpādatvasya puruṣasūktamantreṇopapādanāt tatpratipādyatve tadupapādyagāyatrīśabdārthatāpi tasyaiva prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:5481: puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityata āha - yajñeneti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5488: yajñaśabdaḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścāyaka ityato vidvadrūḍhyetyāha - yajña iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5489: 'hi'; yataḥ yajña iti padena viṣṇvākhyā devatācyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5501: na ca tata eva bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5504: iti śruterbhūtādipāde yajñaśruterabhāvādtyataḥ puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutve smṛtiñcāha - tasminniti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5508: tretāyuge sarvaiḥ puruṣanāmabhī rāma evābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5516: yathā kṛtsne pauruṣe sūkte viṣṇureva na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5518: anena siddhasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvātpuruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5521: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
GSP33bbdip11u:5532: virodhāt na dvayorviṣṇvākhyam ekaṃ vastu pratipādyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5537: trisaptalokāpekṣayā saptamīpañcamyoḥ ekārthatvena virodhābhāvāditi sūtrayojanāmabhiprayannākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - tripāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:5543: yasmādevaṃ bhinnopadeśadvayamasti tasmādatropadeśadvaye gāyatrījyotiśśabdābhyāṃ naikaṃ vastu viṣṇvākhyamucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5555: tathā ca kintūbhayasmin apyupadeśe ekameva viṣṇvākhyaṃ vastūcyate iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5560: tadā lakṣayojanocchritāntarikṣākhyabhuva uparitanasya sarvasyāpi dyutvāt śvetadvīpānantasanavaikuṇṭhānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:5562: rūpatrayaṃ divitiṣṭhatītyucyate iti na saptamyantopadeśavirodhaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip11u:5570: tadendrasadanasya dyutvāt taduccasyāpyuparisthitatvena tatsajātīyasyavaikuṇṭhasya divaḥ paratvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5572: divīndrasadanaṃ caiva tatpare tu divaḥ pare //
GSP33bbdip11u:5573: iti smṛtermerorapi dyutvāttaduccasya bhūspṛṣṭatvena tatsajātīyasyānantāsanasyāpi divaḥ paratā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5574: evaṃ sūryamaṇḍalasyāpi dyutvāttaduccasyoparisthatvena tatsajātīyasya bhūmeḥ kiñcidantaritasya
GSP33bbdip11u:5575: sarvargasamonnatasya śvetadvīpasyāpi divaḥ paratvamastīti na pañcamyantopadeśavirodho 'pīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5576: dyuparatvaṃ ca sambhāvitasajātīyadyuparatvamiti na yāvattvayatkiñcittvamukhena dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5577: vaikuṇṭhasya svargalokātparatvenaiva divaḥ paratvasiddhāvapi tasya 'sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu';
GSP33bbdip11u:5579: na ca lokatrayavivakṣayaivānantāsanādīnāmapi mervādiparatvena divaḥ paratvasyāpi siddheḥ saptalokavivakṣā vyartheti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5580: tathā sati vaikuṇṭhasyāpi dyuśabdārthaniviṣṭatvena tasya sarvadyuparatvāsiddhyāpatyā 'dvyātmakebhyaśca sarvebhyo vaikuṇṭhaścocca ucyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:5586: iti pramāṇabalena citprakṛtyātmakānantāsanaśvetadvīpavaikuṇṭhākhyasthānatraye saptamyanto dyuśabdo dyotamānatvanimittena yaugikaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5587: svargādau tu rūḍha iti upadeśayoravirodha iti prakārāntareṇa virodhaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 //
GSP33bbdip11u:5591: tatra 'tā vā etāḥ śīrṣan chriyaḥ śritāścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mano vākprāṇaḥ'; (ai.ā. 2-1-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:5594: atrādhikaraṇe lokato 'nyatra prasiddhaprāṇanāmno viṣṇau samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5603: tadvai tvamiti vākye uktasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyate na yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5607: ityaitareyavākye uktasya śrutasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5608: kuto na vidyate ityata āha - indriyaissahābhidhānāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:5615: 'tā vā etāḥ'; ityetacca caturmukhaśirasi śiraśśabdapravṛttinimittakathanāya pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5620: ata eva śrayaṇācchriya iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5624: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāptaḥ ata uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5631: sūtraṃ paṭhitvā tatrānugamāditi hetvaṃśaṃ śrutyudāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe - prāṇa iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5647: iti śrutyuktaprāṇo viṣṇuḥ tathaitareyokto 'pi viṣṇureva, na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5655: 'sa eṣo 'suḥ sa eṣa prāṇaḥ sa eṣa bhūtiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:5660: tatraiva 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā ṛcaḥ sarve vedāḥ sarve ghoṣā ekaiva vyāhṛtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5661: prāṇa eva prāṇa ṛca ityeva vidyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:5667: kiñca ye sarve vedāḥ teṣāmapi prāṇa eva pratipādyaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:5670: tatra ṛcastu viśeṣata indrādināmavato viṣṇorguṇān alpajñānāmapi prakāśayantīti,
GSP33bbdip11u:5673: aitareyabhāṣye tu - prathamaprāṇapadamapi viṣayasaptamyantatayā vyāhṛtiśabdaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:5677: atha devarathaḥ 'tasya vāguddhiḥ śrotre pakṣasī cakṣuṣī yukte manaḥ saṅgṛhītā tadayaṃ prāṇo 'dhitiṣṭhati';
GSP33bbdip11u:5681: tathā ca devasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ adhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca ratha ucyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5683: vāgākhyā umā uddhiḥ dhāraṇarajjurūpā adhidaivaṃ viṣṇurathasya prasiddhasyandanasya ca nāgākāromā uddhiḥ 'śrotre';
GSP33bbdip11u:5689: sārathiḥ evam adhidaivaṃ prasiddhasyandanasyāpi rudraḥ sārathiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5695: liṅgena pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ tenaiva siddhānta ityāśaṅkānudayāya liṅgabāhulyoktiḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5699: nanu bāhulyena balavataḥ saiddhāntikaliṅgādapi pūrvavādyuktaliṅgameva balavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:5705: iti / ataḥ kathaṃ tairviṣṇutvaniścaya ityato devatopadeśyatvādiliṅgānāṃ niravakāśatvamapi smṛtyā sādhayati
GSP33bbdip11u:5706: - viṣṇumiti / devāḥ viṣṇumeva prādhānyena śiṣyādiṣu jñānasampradāyapravartanena 'ānayan'; upādiśan /
GSP33bbdip11u:5709: tathā ca viṣṇuṃ bhūtiṃ bhūtirjñānādyaiśvaryarūpa ityupāsate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5716: tathā caikaprakāreṇa prabalātpūrvapakṣiliṅgātprakāradvayenāpi prabalasya saiddhāntikaliṅgasyādhikyena nirṇayopapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5721: yadā bahutvaniravakāśatvākhyaprakāradvayenāpi durbalaliṅgasyobhayathāprabalaliṅgato bādhasambhavena tainaiva prāṇasya viṣṇutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5722: tadā kimu vācyaṃ niravakāśabrahmaśabdābhyāsāditi bhāvenānugamapadaṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5732: vāyuryatra sthita urveva garaṇaṃ stavanaṃ cakre tatsthānamudaraṃ tadgatamityarthaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5733: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 /
GSP33bbdip11u:5741: tathā ca prāṇo viṣṇuriti na yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5743: iti vākyena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasyendreṇa prāṇatayā ātmanaḥ svasyaivopadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5747: iti vākyaṃ tu 'tamindra uvāca ṛṣe priyaṃ vai me dhāmopāgāḥ varaṃ te dadāmīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5754: kimiti? he ṛṣe me priyaṃ dhāmopāgāḥ prāpnuhi /
GSP33bbdip11u:5758: viśvāmitraḥ indrāviṣṭena hariṇā varaṃ te dadānīti punaruktassan uvāca /
GSP33bbdip11u:5759: kimiti? tvāṃ sāmānyataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ jāne /
GSP33bbdip11u:5765: sulabhatvāditi tattvanirṇayaṭīkārītyā ahamitīndrāntaḥsthena hariṇā svātmano nirdeśādasmīti
GSP33bbdip11u:5768: ahaṃ prāṇo 'smīti padānāṃ aheyatvaprakṛṣṭānandatvasaṃhartṛtvajñātṛtvanimittaiḥ bhagavati samanvayapakṣe tu na tadanupapattiriti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5774: tathā cetthaṃ tattvapradīpaṭīkoktā yojanā - nāyaṃ prāṇa indraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5780: yato 'tra prakaraṇe svasthitasyaiva prathamaṃ 'prāṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣe';
GSP33bbdip11u:5783: yato 'tra tasyaiva prāṇākhyaparamātmanaḥ 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:5791: athavā - adhikaścāsāvātmā cādhyātmā tasya sambandhaḥ bahuścāsāvadhyātmasambandhaśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5795: vidyata ityanantaraṃ tadapekṣayāyam upadeśo na svāpekṣayeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5801: adhyātmatvenāntaryāmitvena indrādirūpabahudehasambandhaḥ sarvagatatvamuktaṃ vidyate na caitadatra jīvaviśeṣendre vidyate yujyate tasmāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:5804: iti śruterindrādīnāṃ viṣṇudehatvādaikyavyapadeśaḥ śarīraśarīribhāvanibandhana iti jñāpanāyādhyātmetyuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5805: anena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasya taṃ pratīndreṇa prāṇatayātmopadeśādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5806: kintu indra eveti cet - nendro 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5813: adhiścāsau ātmā ceti dehaḥ paramātmā cocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5814: tathā ca yasmādadhyātmano viṣṇorindraviśvāmitrādidehasambandha ukto 'sti tasmāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:5815: athavā - hi yasmāt asminnindre adhyātmasambandhabhūmā - adhirīśvare - adhikasyātmanaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:5816: paramātmanaḥ sambandhasyāveśasya bhūmā bāhulyaṃ vidyate tasmādupadeśasya sannihitaparamātmaviṣayatvopapteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5818: hi yasmāt asmin prakaraṇe 'dhyātmasambandhabhūmoktaḥ tasmāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5821: nanu yadi prāṇaśabdenendreṇāpi viṣṇureva svātmādisarvagatatayocyate tarhi mayi prāṇa iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:5827: tathā ca yato 'pi prāṇasya viṣṇutve 'pyupadeśaḥ prāṇo vāham ityevaṃrūpo yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:5836: yathā vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ antaryāmivivakṣayā 'ahaṃ manurabhavam';
GSP33bbdip11u:5838: tathā ayamapyupadeśo yujyate ata iti sūtrayojanāmabhiprayan sautraśāstrapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe - śāstramiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5842: yadvā - śāsti prerayati sarvāniti vyutapattyā antaryāmītyetadeva śāstramityasya vyākhyānaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33bbdip11u:5847: tadanusāreṇa ca tattvapradīpe śāsturantaryāmiṇo viṣṇoriti vyākhyānepi nāsya tadvirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5848: yatastatparyāyaśabdavyākhyānenaiva śāstraśabdo vyākhyāto bhavatītyāśayena śāstraśabdaparyāyaśāstṛśabdo vyākhyāyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5849: yadvā - śāstraśabde śāstṛ a ityavayavavibhāgamabhipretya śāstrityaṃśasyāntaryāmiṇa ityanena aśabdasya viṣṇorityanena ca vyākhyātattvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:5850: atra tu avayavavibhāgamavivakṣitvā śāstramityakhaṇḍapadasyāntaryāmiti vyākhyānāt tadanukūlatayā 'saṃvicchāstram';
GSP33bbdip11u:5859: svapnaḥ / agrahaḥ jāgratsvapnaviṣayajñānarahitā śayyā suṣuptiḥ nāmarūpakriyāsu śabdārthakarmasu vṛttirvyāvṛttiryanyāḥ sā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5865: paraṃ uttamaṃ padaṃ sadbhiḥ prāpyaṃ brahma aham acintayamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5871: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogaḥ kathaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkyāṃ tatra tuśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtimevāha - tattaditi/
GSP33bbdip11u:5885: anena harau paramamukhyatā anyatra kevalamukhyatā coktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5889: tānavivekenājñāḥ kevalajīvādau prayuñjate dahati śabdamiva kāṣṭhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:5890: prājñāstu mukhyāmukhyavivekavanto hyamukhmarthamanādṛtya mukhyārthe harau prayuñjataiti tattvanirṇaṭīkoktamanusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5891: 'pādme'; ityanantaram 'antaryāmiṇyahamādipadānāṃ mukhyatvokteḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā ahamādyupadeśo yukta eva';
GSP33bbdip11u:5895: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogādarśanāt tadayoga ityāśaṅkāṃ sūtroktadṛṣṭāntavivaraṇena pariharati - ahamiti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5901: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
GSP33bbdip11u:5903: iti jīvaliṅgaṃ prāṇasaṃvādādimukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ tasmāt neti cet -
GSP33bbdip11u:5907: saṃvādo vivādaḥ kalahaḥ prāṇasya prāṇaissaha saṃvāda iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5908: tathā ca yasmādatra prakaraṇe 'taṃ śataṃ varṣāṇyabhyārcat tasmācchataṃ varṣāṇi puruṣāyuṣo bhavanti'; (ai.ā. 2-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:5909: ityanena yacchatasaṃvatsaraparyantaṃ prāṇasya jīvadehe 'vastānahetukaṃ śatāyuṣṭvarūpaṃ jīvaliṅgamuktaṃ tat 'tāvanti śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:5912: iti vākyena prāṇasya prāṇairindriyaiḥ saha saṃvādarūpamukhyaprāṇaliṅgamuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5913: yasmāccādipadagṛhītaṃ 'prāṇo vaṃśa iti sthaviraḥ śākalyastadyathā śālāvaṃśe sarve
GSP33bbdip11u:5914: 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāssyuḥ evamasmin prāṇe cakṣuśśrotraṃ mano vāgindriyāṇi śarīraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:5916: iti vākyena sarvajīvendriyadehadhārakatvarūpaliṅgaṃ coktamasti tasmādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5921: tathāpi liṅgasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu anugamo 'stīti jñāpanāyopaniṣado jīvaliṅge tātparyamastīti jñāpayitum anusandhivākyamevodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5922: siddhānte śrutyarthastu - puruṣāyuṣaḥ śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi śatasaṃvatsarāntaḥpraviṣṭāharniyāmakasūryagatabhagavatpuruṣarūpāṇi tāvanti sahasrāṇi /
GSP33bbdip11u:5923: kiyanti? bṛhatīsahasragatākṣarāṇāṃ vācyāni puṃrūpāṇi yāvanti sahasrāṇi tāvanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5924: tathā ca tāni ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi sampannāni bhavanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5934: na coktajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgavirodha ityatastatrahetutvena yataḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā tvayamupadeśaḥ ityasyānuṣaṅgaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5935: kimarthamantaryāmīti praśnasyāntarupāstyarthamiti parihāraṃ cābhipretya na copāsane 'vāntarabhedābhāva iti codyottaratvena pravṛttam 'upāsā';
GSP33bbdip11u:5939: tathā ca dehāntargatatvena tadbahirgatatvena sarvagatatveneti prakāreṇa 'upāsātraividhyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:5941: nanu tathāpi kathanaṃ vyarthaṃ vastuta upāsanātraividhyasyehānuktasyāntaryāmikathanāprayojakatvādityataḥ pravṛttam 'āśritatvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:5951: atropāsanātraividhyamucyata ityatrāpi kiṃ liṅgamityata āha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5956: anena bhagavato dehāntaḥpraveśokteḥ ukteścopāsanārthatvāt antarupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5962: tathā ca tatamaṃ atiśayena vyāptaṃ niravadhikavyāptimantaṃ 'brahma'
GSP33bbdip11u:5968: jānannaitareyaḥ itarāyā apatyaṃ pumān viśālasaṃjñāt ṛṣeḥ utpannaḥ aitareyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5969: 'mahidāso'; mahino mahātmāno devāḥ dāsabhūtāḥ yasyāsau bhagavānāhetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5971: atra bahirupāstyarthaṃ mahidāsa āheti bahirupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5980: asyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ aitareyasaṃjñayaivetarāputrasya mahidāsasya ṛṣitvasiddhyā taduktervyarthatvāt / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5984: tathāpi mahidāsasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha - mahidāseti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5989: iti chāndogyabhāṣye anantaroktabhagavadanyaḥ tatsaṃjñaketarāputraḥ ṛṣiratra na vivakṣitaḥ, kintu /
GSP33bbdip11u:5998: tadavatārabhūtaḥ pūrvoktaḥ sa evātra vivakṣita ityāha - sākṣāditi/
GSP33bbdip11u:6007: tathā ca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ manuṣyarṣigandharvadevākhyādhikāriṇāṃ teṣu trividhopāsaneṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:6008: madhye tattadupāsane yathākramaṃ bahirantarvyāptirūpaikaikopāsana eva yogyatayā yogyatvena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6010: tathā cānekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāmadhikāriṇāṃ naikavidhopāsanayā brahmajñānamiti tattraividhyamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6014: puruṣāṇāmuktānekavidhopāsanayogyatā kuto jñāyata ityataḥ kartṛviśeṣānanupādāya sāmānyataḥ upāsakatraividhyapratipādikāṃ smṛtiṃ paṭhati - keṣāñciditi
GSP33bbdip11u:6022: iti brāhma ityasya tattadupāsanayogyatayā tadviśiṣṭatvena puruṣāṇāmāśritatvāduktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ / @----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6046: na cātra “yeṣāṃ bahirupāsanena mokṣasteṣāmapi hṛdyupāsanaṃ kiñcitkāryameva“iti bṛhadbhāṣyeṇa “bhagavān bimbadarśanenainaṃ mocayati“iti nyāyavivaraṇena ca virodhaśśaṅkyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6047: agnāviti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvena bimbaśabditasvasvayogyātmāparokṣārthaṃ hṛdyupāsanasyāpi sarvaiḥ kāryatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6048: mocakayogyāparokṣadvārābhūtāvatārādyaparokṣasādhanopāsanāya eva taistaiḥ prācuryeṇa prakaraṇasyāgnāviti vākyena vyavasthayā pratipādanācca /
GSP33bbdip11u:6053: ato na tadyogāditi hetvasiddhiḥ śaṅkyeti bhāva /
GSP33bbdip11u:6072: na caikavidhopāsanayā sarveṣāṃ brahmāparokṣasambhavāt kimupāsātraividhyeneti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6073: 'tadyogāt'; teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ tasmin tadupāsana eva yogyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6074: anekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ekavidhapāsanayāparokṣāsambhavena yogyatābhedādupāsātraividhyasyāvaśyakatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:6075: na ca vivādakartṛtvaliṅgasyāntaryāmiviṣayatve 'udāsīnau ca tāvāstāṃ keśavaścābjasambhavaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:6079: viṣṇurevāyaṃ prāṇaḥ ānandamayaśceti yuktā tajjijñāseti siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:6090: 1. taduktam īśāvāsyabhāṣyaṭīkāyāṃ - 'brahmādīnām aprāptajñānamutpadyate śriyastu sarvadā vidyata iti vivekaḥ'; iti/
